translation.en: [Ariana] I take it right when I wake up.
translation.zh: 我一醒来就服用

translation.en: I keep it next to my toothbrush so I remember to take it.
translation.zh:
我把药放在牙刷旁边
这样就不会忘记吃

translation.en: Takes about 40 minutes to kick in and you can feel it.
translation.zh: 需要40分钟才能见效 会有感觉的

translation.en: I start to sweat.
translation.zh: 我开始出汗

translation.en: My heart accelerates very rapidly.
translation.zh: 心脏跳动非常快

translation.en: [Blue] The fives get you through the day a little faster.
translation.zh: 服用五片就能让你的一天过得非常快

translation.en: But if it's Monday, sometimes you take ten.
translation.zh: 如果是周一 有时候会服十片

translation.en: [Matthew] From there, this wave of happiness hit me that was like a warm glow.
translation.zh:
服下后 幸福的感觉阵阵袭来
好像沐浴着温暖的光辉

translation.en: [Delaney] Suddenly, I could pay attention and my handwriting got neater.
translation.zh:
突然 我可以集中精神了
书写都变得更工整

translation.en: I thought that was so cool.
translation.zh: 我觉得太爽了

translation.en: [Eben] My mind came alive, my body felt alive.
translation.zh: 大脑活跃起来了 身体也有活力了

translation.en: When it works, it works like a bang.
translation.zh: 起效后 效果是非常惊人的

translation.en: [man] Suddenly, you are in a room with 10,000 doors
translation.zh:
突然间 你就像进了
一个有一万道门的房间

translation.en: and behind a bunch of the doors is some cool stuff.
translation.zh: 那一道道门背后有很酷的东西

translation.en: You are gonna wanna try and run as fast as possible
translation.zh: 你会想去试试 然后尽快跑起来

translation.en: and stay awake as long as possible, to look in all the doors.
translation.zh: 尽量保持清醒 把所有门都检查一遍

translation.en: [interviewer] What did Adderall do for you when you were playing the game?
translation.zh: 你玩游戏时阿得拉有什么效果？

translation.en: [Jasper] Laser-like focus, reaction time increased, alert.
translation.zh:
注意力像激光一样集中
反应时间增加了 很警觉

translation.en: [Leigh] The first week I took it, I was like, "I like this. This is good."
translation.zh:
我服用的第一周 心想
“这药我喜欢 感觉很好”

translation.en: [Nathanael] Adderall. Warning,
translation.zh: 阿得拉 警告

translation.en: side effects may include being awesome at everything.
translation.zh: 副作用可能包括做什么都异常出色

translation.en: [Blue] It's like the New York Stock Exchange ticker.
translation.zh: 好像纽交所的自动收报机

translation.en: That's what my mind looks like all the time.
translation.zh: 我的大脑一直就是那种感觉

translation.en: When I take Adderall, it's like the ticker slows down.
translation.zh:
服用阿得拉后
就像自动收报机慢下来了

translation.en: [Jasper] I can zone in on something and completely ignore everything.
translation.zh:
我可以把精力集中在某些东西上
并彻底忽视其他一切事物

translation.en: [Peter] Every investment banker hears about the heyday of cocaine
translation.zh:
这里的每位投资银行家
都听说过可卡因的鼎盛时期

translation.en: and doing it off their desks and doing it off strippers,
translation.zh:
他们在桌子上吸
在脱衣舞女郎身上吸

translation.en: and that's not how it is with Adderall.
translation.zh: 阿得拉就不是这样

translation.en: -Who takes Adderall anymore? -[Carver] Half the kids in Palo Alto.
translation.zh: 谁还服用阿得拉？ 帕洛阿尔托半数的孩子都服用

translation.en: -[Ariana] You name it, I've tried it. -[Regina] Adderall.
translation.zh:
-你随便说 我都试过
-阿得拉

translation.en: [Ariana] Ritalin, Concerta, Adderall, Vyvanse, Focalin.
translation.zh:
利他林、专注达、阿得拉
甲磺赖氨酸安非他命、右哌醋甲酯

translation.en: [Brigid Polk] Amphetamine...
translation.zh: 安非他命…

translation.en: [Fadiman] The idea that children were given amphetamine in the '60s
translation.zh:
上世纪60年代
让儿童服用安非他命的主意

translation.en: would have appalled everyone.
translation.zh: 肯定会令所有人震惊

translation.en: From now on, it's nothing but fresh air, lots of hugs
translation.zh:
从现在开始 只有新鲜空气
很多拥抱

translation.en: and good old-fashioned Ritalin.
translation.zh: 还有我们耳熟能详的利他林

translation.en: [Delaney] I am Adderall. I'm never not on it.
translation.zh: 我就是阿得拉 我一直在服用

translation.en: I would never think of something as me not being on Adderall.
translation.zh:
如果不吃阿得拉了
我不知道自己会怎么样

translation.en: This is the most ridiculous bathroom in the entire world.
translation.zh: 这是全世界最荒唐的浴室

translation.en: Everyone has their own starter pack.
translation.zh: 每个人都有自己的新手套装

translation.en: It's like a little telling of y'all are.
translation.zh: 好像说明了我们是怎样的人

translation.en: "Free the nipple."
translation.zh: “解放乳头”

translation.en: Jews 'cause I'm Jewish.
translation.zh: 犹太人 因为我是犹太人

translation.en: "New Jersey" 'cause I tell people I'm from New York, but I'm not.
translation.zh:
“新泽西” 因为我告诉别人
我来自纽约 其实不是

translation.en: I'm from New Jersey. So that's a running joke.
translation.zh:
我来自新泽西
所以那只是我到处讲的笑话

translation.en: And a Jew smoking weed through a menorah.
translation.zh: 一个犹太人用犹太教灯台吸大麻烟卷

translation.en: This is my favorite thing in here.
translation.zh: 这是我在这里最喜欢的东西

translation.en: Every time we go out, we take something home with us.
translation.zh: 每次我们出去 都会带点家里的东西

translation.en: So, my parents, right before I left to school, were like,
translation.zh:
我父母在我离开家来上学之前
就说过

translation.en: "We need to get you a lockbox."
translation.zh: “我们得给你弄个带锁的箱子”

translation.en: And I was like, "Why?"
translation.zh: 我问：“为什么？”

translation.en: They were like, "For your pills."
translation.zh: （阿丽亚娜 大二学生） 他们说：“给你装药啊”

translation.en: I was like, "What do you mean, a lockbox? Who's gonna take my pills?"
translation.zh:
我说：“什么意思 带锁的箱子？
谁会拿走我的药？”

translation.en: It's Rx gold.
translation.zh: 像黄金一样珍贵

translation.en: People will take it from you if they know you have it.
translation.zh: （德兰妮 大一学生） 别人知道你有的话 会给你拿走的

translation.en: I don't think I know anyone that is prescribed it
translation.zh: 我认识的有这种药医嘱的人

translation.en: that doesn't sell a little on the side.
translation.zh: 好像没有不私下出售一点的

translation.en: That's a big thing here 'cause it's a hard school,
translation.zh:
这种药在这里很重要
因为这个学校很严格

translation.en: so a lot of people are on Adderall.
translation.zh: 所以很多人服用阿得拉 （哈斯佩尔 大四学生）

translation.en: Why would anyone wanna put this in their body?
translation.zh: 为什么会有人想服这种药呢？

translation.en: [Ariana] This is trazodone.
translation.zh: 这是曲唑酮

translation.en: This is Ativan, for my panic attacks.
translation.zh: 这是安定文 我惊恐发作时服的

translation.en: Then when I got here, I was like,
translation.zh: 我来到这里之后 就觉得

translation.en: "Holy shit. Everybody takes Adderall. Everyone."
translation.zh:
“老天 每个人都在服用阿得拉
所有人”

translation.en: [Jasper] That's an empty one.
translation.zh: 那个是空的

translation.en: [Leigh] I've openly seen people in classes take out their bottle
translation.zh: 我看到过有人在课堂上拿出药瓶

translation.en: and hand off pills to someone next to them.
translation.zh: 把药递给他们旁边的人

translation.en: "Anyone have Addie I could buy? Please. Please."
translation.zh: “谁有阿得拉卖？我想买 拜托”

translation.en: Sometimes I forget that it's illegal.
translation.zh: 有时候我会忘记这种药是非法的

translation.en: There's a public Facebook group, like a classifieds,
translation.zh:
有一个公共的脸书团体
像是分类广告

translation.en: buying and selling anything.
translation.zh: 什么都可以买卖

translation.en: And people will post in there that they're selling 20 XR Adderall,
translation.zh:
有人会在上面发布广告
说他们要卖20片阿得拉XR

translation.en: and not think that they are drug dealing in a public forum.
translation.zh: 而没意识到他们是在公共论坛上贩毒

translation.en: My mom didn't hide it, but I hide it.
translation.zh: 我妈妈都不把它藏起来 但我藏

translation.en: Adderall and Instagram are hand in hand in being the perfect student.
translation.zh:
阿得拉和Instagram
是完美学生的标配

translation.en: [Delaney] You wanna be beautiful and skinny, and you wanna have amazing grades,
translation.zh: 你想又瘦又美 你想拿高分

translation.en: and then you also wanna be able to go out, and Adderall just sews it all up for you.
translation.zh:
然后你还想出去玩
阿得拉可以满足你这一切

translation.en: You've got instant release versus extended release.
translation.zh: 比起长期释放 你会得到即刻的放松

translation.en: People will take it and sit down at the little cubicles in the library.
translation.zh: 大家服用后就坐到图书馆的小隔间里

translation.en: They lay out everything,
translation.zh: 把所有东西摆出来

translation.en: that way you can't be distracted by anything else.
translation.zh: 这样你就不会因为任何其他东西分神

translation.en: And you have a set playlist,
translation.zh: 你会有个固定的播放列表

translation.en: and people will put in their ear buds, and you're ready to roll.
translation.zh: 大家都会戴上耳塞 准备开始学习了

translation.en: [Brown] At the simplest level, the norms that I would say
translation.zh: 从最简单的层面看 我觉得

translation.en: are driving use of performance enhancing drugs
translation.zh: 促使人们服用增强体能药物的

translation.en: are those that simply tell us, "Your task is to concentrate,
translation.zh:
是那些告诉我们
“你的任务是集中注意力… （温迪布朗博士
政治理论家 加州大学伯克利分校）

translation.en: to perform at the highest capacity that you possibly can,
translation.zh: …尽可能发挥最大的能量

translation.en: and to do it for as long as it takes."
translation.zh: 尽可能长时间地去做”这样的要求

translation.en: Whether it's at an investment bank, or whether it's a homework assignment,
translation.zh: 无论是在投资银行还是做家庭作业

translation.en: the question is, "How can you come out on top?"
translation.zh:
问题都是
“你该如何做到出类拔萃？”

translation.en: [Leigh] Obviously, if you're presented with something
translation.zh: 显然 如果有人给一种

translation.en: that will maximize the good things in your life,
translation.zh:
可以让你生活中的美好
放到最大的东西

translation.en: you'll get everything you can out of it.
translation.zh: 你会好好利用这样东西

translation.en: Of course you're gonna want it.
translation.zh: 当然你会想要

translation.en: I was talking to someone about this and they're like,
translation.zh: 我跟别人聊过这事 他们都说

translation.en: "Isn't it the same thing as having a good breakfast before an exam
translation.zh: “这不就是跟考试前吃顿美味早餐

translation.en: and drinking a cup of coffee?
translation.zh: 喝杯咖啡一样吗？

translation.en: Why is medication the thing that's so immoral or unethical
translation.zh: 为什么到吃药这儿就不道德了呢

translation.en: about getting an edge over everyone else?"
translation.zh: 就成了占别人的便宜？”

translation.en: Let's see. I'm taking five classes.
translation.zh: 我们看看 我要上五门课

translation.en: So if I get a 90 on the paper, an 82 on the exam today,
translation.zh:
如果我论文得90分
今天的考试得82分

translation.en: I'll get an 89.77.
translation.zh: 我平均分就是89点77分

translation.en: So that's not gonna fly, unless she rounds up.
translation.zh: 这是不行的 除非四舍五入

translation.en: So, let's say an 83,
translation.zh: 那么 考个83吧

translation.en: but it's also a pride thing.
translation.zh: 这也跟自尊心有关

translation.en: I'd like to finish strong, stronger than I started.
translation.zh: 我想厉害地收尾 比开始时厉害

translation.en: Adderall, for me, has always been like when you're desperate and hopeless,
translation.zh:
阿得拉对我来说一直就像是
当你绝望和无望时

translation.en: and you're like, "I need this right now
translation.zh: 你就会想：“我正好需要这东西

translation.en: because I need to be my best, smartest, fastest self."
translation.zh:
因为我必须做到最好
最聪明、最快速”

translation.en: [Brown] The problem today isn't that jobs are scarcer,
translation.zh: 今天的问题不是工作越来越少

translation.en: or that positions in schools are fewer.
translation.zh: 或者学校的岗位越来越少

translation.en: It's that we live in a hypercompetitive order,
translation.zh:
而是我们生活在
竞争异常激烈的社会中

translation.en: where the competition is not just for arriving,
translation.zh: 这种竞争不是针对新来的人

translation.en: but the competition is never-ending.
translation.zh: 而是无止境的

translation.en: Every human being is now required to understand themselves
translation.zh: 每个人都应当把自己视为

translation.en: as a little bit of human capital.
translation.zh: 人力资本

translation.en: Parents are terribly concerned,
translation.zh: 在孩子出生之前

translation.en: from before the moment that their children are born,
translation.zh: 父母就非常担忧

translation.en: about what that human capital value will be in their child,
translation.zh:
他们的孩子
会有怎样的人力资本价值

translation.en: and are tending it with everything from Mozart in the womb
translation.zh:
他们想尽一切办法帮助孩子
从怀孕期间给胎儿听莫扎特

translation.en: to positions in preschools and access to certain kinds of sports
translation.zh:
到争取幼儿园的位置
到接触特定的体育运动

translation.en: and certain kinds of curriculums.
translation.zh: 上各种课程

translation.en: The anxiety about the human capital value
translation.zh: 我觉得这种对于孩子们能够培养出

translation.en: that their children are able to develop
translation.zh: 多少人力资本价值的焦虑

translation.en: leads, I think, almost inexorably toward Adderall,
translation.zh:
几乎不可避免地
导致了孩子一上高中或大学

translation.en: either offered by the parents or offered to peers by one another
translation.zh: 就会服阿得拉 要么是父母给的

translation.en: once they hit high school and college.
translation.zh: 要么就是同龄人给的

translation.en: I sometimes joke about how when I was in college,
translation.zh:
（安让查特吉博士 神经系主任） 我有时候开玩笑
讲起我上大学的时候

translation.en: people did drugs to check out.
translation.zh: 人们嗑药是为了逃避现实

translation.en: And now people do drugs to check in.
translation.zh: 现在 人们嗑药却是为了专注于现实

translation.en: And that says something about our culture right now.
translation.zh:
这反映了我们现在的文化中的
某些东西

translation.en: [interviewer] What do you think it says? It makes me kind of depressed.
translation.zh:
你觉得反映了什么？
这种现象让我有些沮丧

translation.en: We probably have meds for that.
translation.zh: 我们可能也有药可以解决沮丧

translation.en: I had tons of friends in high school that were on Adderall,
translation.zh: 我高中时有好多朋友都吃阿得拉

translation.en: and because they were on Adderall or Vyvanse or something like that,
translation.zh:
因为他们都吃阿得拉
甲磺赖氨酸安非他命之类的

translation.en: were getting two and a half time on the SATs or something,
translation.zh:
会多出两倍半的时间
来备战高考之类的

translation.en: and got to take it alone. And I wanted it.
translation.zh: 必须单独服用 我也想服

translation.en: I had three straight days with this psychiatrist.
translation.zh: 我曾连续三天去这个精神科医生那里

translation.en: I remember the testing was so stressful for me
translation.zh: 我记得测试让我感觉压力好大

translation.en: 'cause it's made to make you feel dumb
translation.zh: 因为它会让你觉得自己好傻

translation.en: and feel like you can't complete these tasks that other people can.
translation.zh:
感觉你完成不了这些
别人能完成的任务

translation.en: That was the first time I was like, "I might really need this."
translation.zh:
那是我第一次觉得
“我可能真的需要这种药”

translation.en: ADD is a condition where people have more trouble focusing with their attention.
translation.zh:
注意力缺乏症
是人很难集中注意力的状态

translation.en: People typically are distractible. Because there aren't clear-cut boundaries,
translation.zh:
人本身就容易分心
因为没有明确的界限

translation.en: it becomes fuzzy of what do you treat and what do you not treat.
translation.zh:
所以什么该治 什么不用治
就变得很模糊

translation.en: [Leigh] I got diagnosed by the psychiatrist,
translation.zh: 我是精神科医生诊断出来的

translation.en: and I was thrilled because I had the SAT in a couple months.
translation.zh:
我很兴奋
因为还有几个月就要高考了

translation.en: I had never tried it,
translation.zh: 我以前从来没试过

translation.en: but the first week that I took it, I was like,
translation.zh: 但我服药的第一周 感觉就是

translation.en: "I like this. This is good."
translation.zh: “这药我喜欢 感觉很好”

translation.en: I remember I was concerned about not feeling entirely myself,
translation.zh:
我记得我以前还担心
感觉不太像自己了

translation.en: too zoned and I didn't feel as funny as usual.
translation.zh:
注意力太集中
感觉不像平时那么有趣

translation.en: I remember saying that.
translation.zh: 我记得自己那样说过

translation.en: But you had to pick and choose,
translation.zh: 但你必须做出选择

translation.en: and I wanted to pick getting good grades and doing well on the SAT.
translation.zh: 我选考高分 高考顺利

translation.en: [Schwarz] The desire to do better is pretty universal.
translation.zh: 人们普遍渴望变得更好

translation.en: People like succeeding.
translation.zh: 人人都喜欢成功

translation.en: People like not letting others down.
translation.zh:
（艾伦施瓦兹
记者兼《多动症国度》作者） 谁都不喜欢让别人失望

translation.en: So, what you've seen is that every generation has found a different way
translation.zh:
所以你会看到每一代人
都有不用的方法

translation.en: to try to enhance their performance.
translation.zh: 来努力改善自己的表现

translation.en: Now in this case, a lot of the time, it has been what we now call ADHD drugs.
translation.zh:
目前这种情况下 很多时候
就是用我们说的多动症药

translation.en: [newscaster] In the high pressure rat race of academic achievement,
translation.zh: 在高压力的学术成就竞争中

translation.en: there is one fix students are turning to at an alarming rate to get ahead.
translation.zh:
为了胜人一筹 学生们
正以惊人的速度转向一种应急办法

translation.en: [interviewer] And how are you doing that?
translation.zh: 你怎么做到的？

translation.en: [man] Adderall. I've never gotten a B in my life.
translation.zh: 服用阿得拉 我以前从来没得过B

translation.en: [reporter] Some students are calling it college crack.
translation.zh: 有些学生称之为“大学可卡因”

translation.en: [Danny Brown sings] ♪ Eating on an Adderall ♪ ♪ Wash it down with alcohol ♪
translation.zh: 吃一片阿得拉 用酒送服它

translation.en: ♪ Writing holy mackerel Actual or factual ♪
translation.zh: 服完阿得拉 下笔如有神

translation.en: [Tom Lehrer singing] ♪ To the beer and Benzedrine ♪
translation.zh: 喝了啤酒对苯丙胺

translation.en: [Future singing] ♪ I can't feel my face I'm on Adderall, nauseous ♪
translation.zh:
我感觉不到自己的脸
我服了阿得拉 有点恶心

translation.en: [Tom Lehrer singing] ♪ Golden college days ♪
translation.zh: 黄金般的大学生活

translation.en: The first article about college abuse of amphetamine to study
translation.zh:
第一篇关于大学生滥用安非他命的
研究论文===

translation.en: was in Time magazine in 1937.
translation.zh: 于1937年发表在《时代》杂志上

translation.en: This ain't new.
translation.zh: （《时代》） 这并不新鲜

translation.en: [Rasmussen] In the early days, they called it the pep-pill.
translation.zh: 早期他们称其“活力药丸”

translation.en: Pep is what Americans want.
translation.zh: 活力正是美国人想要的

translation.en: It's about drive, ambition, being productive and hardworking,
translation.zh: 它关乎动力、雄心、生产力和勤劳

translation.en: and making the sale, and getting the job done.
translation.zh: 完成销量和完成工作

translation.en: [man] Kellogg's Pep sure is a treat to eat.
translation.zh: 凯洛格公司的活力早餐当然是美食

translation.en: [Rasmussen] So, Dr. Gordon Alles was a young biochemist
translation.zh:
当时年轻的生化学家
戈登亚勒斯博士

translation.en: trying to create an allergy medicine.
translation.zh: 在尝试研发一种过敏药

translation.en: And that's how, in 1929,
translation.zh: 正因如此 1929年

translation.en: he happened to synthesize the drug we now call amphetamine.
translation.zh:
他碰巧合成了一种药
也就是我们现在叫的安非他命

translation.en: He injected himself with 50 milligrams of the salt,
translation.zh: 他给自己注射了50毫克这种盐溶液

translation.en: which is quite a high dose.
translation.zh: 这个剂量非常高

translation.en: And his lab notes are absolutely fascinating.
translation.zh: 他的实验室笔记也是绝对精彩

translation.en: Within minutes, he's like, "Strong feeling of well-being."
translation.zh:
几分钟内 他就感觉
“强烈地感觉到非常幸福”

translation.en: He's like, "I really like this!"
translation.zh: 他写道：“我喜欢这种感觉！”

translation.en: [Rasmussen] After about an hour, Alles noted,
translation.zh: 大约一小时后 亚勒斯又写道

translation.en: "Feeling of well-being, palpitation, rather sleepless night,
translation.zh:
“感觉充满幸福和激动
好一个不眠之夜

translation.en: mind seemed to race from one subject to another."
translation.zh:
大脑好像从一个主题
迅速切换到另一个”

translation.en: This is the record of the first amphetamine experience,
translation.zh: 这就是第一次安非他命实验的记录

translation.en: Alles' self-experiment in June, 1929.
translation.zh: 1929年6月亚勒斯的自我实验

translation.en: It's very clear that from the beginning, this amphetamine product was a compound,
translation.zh:
很明显 从一开始
安非他命就是一种合成药

translation.en: a chemical that needed a medical use.
translation.zh: 是一种医疗用途的化学品

translation.en: [Schwarz] It didn't take long for amphetamine to become a prescription medication.
translation.zh: 很快 安非他命就成了一种处方药

translation.en: In the mid-1930s, Smith Kline & French introduced it as Benzedrine.
translation.zh:
20世纪30年代中期
葛兰素史克公司将其作为苯丙胺引入

translation.en: And you would snort it and it would clear your sinuses.
translation.zh: 用鼻子吸入 可以缓解鼻窦炎

translation.en: The problem is, amphetamine feels really good to a lot of people,
translation.zh:
问题是 太多人觉得
安非他命的感觉太好了

translation.en: and it gets them jazzed and ready to perform.
translation.zh: 服用后让人非常活泼 有表现欲望

translation.en: [Harry Gibson singing] ♪ Who put the Benzedrine ♪ ♪ In Mrs. Murphy's Ovaltine? ♪
translation.zh:
谁把苯丙胺放进
墨菲太太的阿华田里？

translation.en: ♪ Now she wants to swing The Highland Fling ♪
translation.zh: 现在她想跳苏格兰高地舞

translation.en: ♪ She says that Benzedrine's the thing That makes her spring ♪
translation.zh: 她说苯丙胺让她感受到了春天

translation.en: [Schwarz] College kids, and other people, started taking the gauze out
translation.zh: 大学的孩子和其他人开始揭掉纱布

translation.en: and chewing it to get the amphetamine into their system more quickly.
translation.zh:
直接嚼食
让安非他命更快被身体吸收

translation.en: [Fred Astaire singing] ♪ I'm like the B-19 Loaded with Benzedrine ♪
translation.zh: 我喜欢装满苯丙胺的B19

translation.en: ♪ When I come on the scene I bust a hole in the sky ♪
translation.zh: 当我出现时 我会让天空裂开一个洞

translation.en: [Rasmussen] When World War II broke out,
translation.zh: 二战爆发后

translation.en: military doctors in Germany tried it on some military cadets.
translation.zh:
德国的军医在一些军校学员身上
试了这种药

translation.en: Of course, the students liked it.
translation.zh: 当然 那些学员都很喜欢

translation.en: The British found these pills in downed German planes.
translation.zh:
英军在击落的德军飞机上
发现了这种药

translation.en: They seemed to be acting like supermen,
translation.zh: 他们表现得好像超人

translation.en: and maybe it was drugs that were making them supermen.
translation.zh: 或许是那些药让他们成了超人

translation.en: The American military,
translation.zh: 美军

translation.en: when they saw that the British were approving the drug and introducing it,
translation.zh: 看到英军批准用那种药并引进时

translation.en: they hurried along the studies and took it on, too.
translation.zh: 他们赶紧跟进研究 然后也开始服用

translation.en: Just a cup of coffee.
translation.zh: 来杯咖啡就好

translation.en: Really, Mr. Holden,
translation.zh: 真的 霍尔顿先生

translation.en: a hardworking executive like you should have a hot lunch.
translation.zh:
像你这样工作辛苦的高管
应该吃顿热午餐

translation.en: Very well. Just scramble me a couple of Benzedrine tablets.
translation.zh: 好呀 给我拿几片苯丙胺

translation.en: [Rasmussen] Benzedrine took off after the war as a general practice antidepressant.
translation.zh:
战后苯丙胺作为一种普通的抗抑郁药
开始流行

translation.en: So did Dexedrine.
translation.zh: 右旋苯丙胺也是

translation.en: Among its uses was weight control.
translation.zh: 其中一个作用就是控制体重

translation.en: Also, painful menstruation, what we'd call PMD, was tested.
translation.zh:
还有痛经 我们称之为PMD
也进行了测试

translation.en: This is a funny trial.
translation.zh: 这是一次有趣的尝试

translation.en: The doctor who was running it was working at a factory
translation.zh: 负责测试的医生在一家

translation.en: where all the assembly line workers were women.
translation.zh:
流水线上所有工人
都是女性的工厂测试

translation.en: The subjects were requesting more of it,
translation.zh: 测试对象要求加大剂量

translation.en: but it turned out that the demand
translation.zh: 但结果证明那种要求

translation.en: had nothing to do with their actual menstrual cycle.
translation.zh: 跟她们的实际月经周期无关

translation.en: They just liked taking the drugs.
translation.zh: 她们只是喜欢吃那种药

translation.en: Spot on.
translation.zh: 刚刚好

translation.en: [man] One, two...
translation.zh: 一、二…

translation.en: [Rasmussen] Amphetamine inhalers became a kind of a staple in jazz culture,
translation.zh: 安非他命吸入器成了爵士文化的主题

translation.en: particularly in the bebop circles.
translation.zh: 尤其是在比波普爵士乐圈

translation.en: Charlie Parker was certainly a regular user.
translation.zh: 查利帕克当然是经常服用

translation.en: Some of the people that are later remembered
translation.zh: 后来被记住的一些人

translation.en: as the important beat writers, like Jack Kerouac,
translation.zh:
一些重要的垮掉派作家
比如杰克凯鲁亚克

translation.en: were going to these jazz clubs.
translation.zh: 会去这些爵士俱乐部

translation.en: Kerouac really admired the way bebop sounded
translation.zh: 凯鲁亚克十分欣赏比波普爵士乐

translation.en: and he wanted to model his own writing
translation.zh: 他希望将这种非常自由、奔放的感觉

translation.en: after this very spontaneous, free rush of sound.
translation.zh: 写入自己的作品里 （史蒂夫艾伦秀）

translation.en: "Come on, boy, go thou across the ground. Go moan for man. Go moan, go groan."
translation.zh:
“来吧 孩子 穿过地面
为人类悲哀吧 悲哀吧”

translation.en: [Rasmussen] When he discovered the amphetamine inhaler,
translation.zh: 当他发现安非他命吸入器后

translation.en: he really took to it and used it as an aid for his writing for a long time.
translation.zh:
就喜欢上了 很长时间里
他以此来帮助自己写作

translation.en: It was normal to have amphetamine when you wanted it.
translation.zh: 想服安非他命就服 这是很正常的

translation.en: Most people probably just got it
translation.zh: 大多数人可能让家庭医生

translation.en: by asking for a prescription from their family practitioner.
translation.zh: 开个处方 就能得到这种药

translation.en: Turn around and drop your pants. This goes in the gluteus.
translation.zh:
转过去 把裤子脱了
我会把这东西推进你的臀肌

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 这是什么东西？

translation.en: It's an energy serum.
translation.zh: 能量浆液

translation.en: Max Jacobson, who's known as Dr. Feelgood by many of his patients,
translation.zh:
马克斯雅克布森 很多病人
称他为“兴奋剂医生”

translation.en: was one of these speed doctors.
translation.zh: 就是其中一名兴奋剂医生

translation.en: For a time, he was John F. Kennedy's favorite doctor.
translation.zh: 他曾一度是约翰肯尼迪最钟爱的医生

translation.en: [Don Draper] What does it do?
translation.zh: 有什么作用？

translation.en: 24 to 72 hours of uninterrupted creative focus, energy and confidence.
translation.zh:
24至72小时不间断地
可以保持注意力、能量和自信

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: And if you listen to The Beatles, the song "Doctor Robert"
translation.zh:
如果你听甲壳虫乐队的歌
有一首叫《罗伯特医生》

translation.en: is about a doctor in New York who'd freely prescribe amphetamine
translation.zh:
讲的就是纽约一位医生
他可以自由地给摇滚明星和名人

translation.en: to rock stars and celebrities who wanted it.
translation.zh: 开安非他命 有求必应

translation.en: [The Beatles singing] ♪ Well, well, well, you're feeling fine ♪
translation.zh: 你感觉良好

translation.en: [Rasmussen] The '60s were called the go-go years for a number of reasons.
translation.zh:
因为很多原因
上世纪60年代被称作沸腾年代

translation.en: And that's the way Andy Warhol experienced the early '60s,
translation.zh: 安迪我活儿经历的60年代早期

translation.en: up on amphetamine all the time. Not just him, his whole scene.
translation.zh:
就是依赖安非他命的年代
不只是他 整个环境就那样 （伊迪塞奇威克）

translation.en: Whoo!
translation.zh: （布里吉特波尔克）

translation.en: And let me see, the right side or the left side?
translation.zh: 让我看看 左边还是右边？

translation.en: Oh, well, you never...
translation.zh: 噢 你从来没有…

translation.en: Doesn't matter if you get the left or the right, or go drop dead.
translation.zh: 左右都没关系 猝死都没关系

translation.en: Ding! [Schwarz] A lot of women, and men, don't get me wrong,
translation.zh: 越战中的很多女性士兵

translation.en: soldiers in Vietnam, got horribly addicted.
translation.zh: 当然也包括男性士兵 都严重上瘾

translation.en: That's why we have the Controlled Substances Act.
translation.zh:
所以我们才出台了
《受管制药品法案》

translation.en: [Frank Zappa] Hi, wanna die?
translation.zh: 嗨 想死吗？

translation.en: Start today, use a little speed, you've got five years.
translation.zh:
从今天开始 来点兴奋剂
你就只能再活五年

translation.en: Rot your mind, rot your heart, rot your kidneys, cucaracha.
translation.zh:
它腐蚀大脑 腐蚀心脏
腐蚀肾脏 螳螂舞 （弗兰克扎帕）

translation.en: [announcer] A public service announcement of the Do It Now Foundation.
translation.zh: “即刻行动基金会”的公益广告

translation.en: [Rasmussen] By the height of the pharmaceutical speed epidemic,
translation.zh: 在兴奋剂泛滥的时期

translation.en: 50 pills per man, woman and child per year
translation.zh:
每年每名男性、女性和儿童
要服用50片

translation.en: were being manufactured by US pharmaceutical firms.
translation.zh: 都是美国制药公司生产的

translation.en: The ingredients are essentially the same as what's used
translation.zh:
配方和如今的注意力缺陷药物
大同小异

translation.en: for attention deficit today, including Adderall.
translation.zh: 也包括阿得拉

translation.en: Adderall is a performance enhancer, yes.
translation.zh: 阿得拉能促进提高表现 是的

translation.en: Um, and I don't think there's anything wrong with that.
translation.zh: 这本身没什么问题

translation.en: [Nathanael] When you hit the sweet spot with Adderall, it's like a Zen flow.
translation.zh:
当你靠着阿得拉到达甜蜜点时
就像禅意在体内流淌

translation.en: Everything quiet, you're quiet,
translation.zh: 一切都归于平静 你也很平静

translation.en: and things are just there, and so are you,
translation.zh: 一切都是原本的样子 你也是

translation.en: and then you just do what you need to do.
translation.zh: 你只用做需要做的事

translation.en: I have an electric unicycle.
translation.zh: 我有一辆电动独轮车

translation.en: I'm riding like I do every day. I think I was going to Home Depot.
translation.zh:
我每天骑着它
有次我好像是去家得宝

translation.en: Somebody leans out of the car window and goes, "Fuck you, techie."
translation.zh:
有人把头伸出车窗
对我喊：“去死吧 技术宅”

translation.en: Only in the Bay Area would that happen.
translation.zh: 只有在旧金山湾区会发生这种事

translation.en: It was weird 'cause they just assumed
translation.zh: 很奇怪 因为他们擅自认为

translation.en: since I was on an electric unicycle that I must be in tech.
translation.zh:
我骑着电动独轮车
所以我肯定是技术员

translation.en: There is an archetype in tech of a person who,
translation.zh:
对于技术行业的人是什么样的
他们有原型

translation.en: in most cases, doesn't exist,
translation.zh: 但大多时候 原型不存在

translation.en: and he works 16 hours a day, every day, and the code just comes out of him.
translation.zh:
他每天工作16小时
代码从他脑袋里蹦出来

translation.en: And just flawlessly from start to finish, it's just Mozart on the screen.
translation.zh:
完美无瑕地从开始到结束
屏幕上都是莫扎特

translation.en: And everybody wants to be that person.
translation.zh: 人人都想做那种人

translation.en: I did, and I'm sure some part of me still does.
translation.zh:
我曾经就这么想
现在肯定仍有一部分我这么希望着

translation.en: We all want to be awesome at the things that we're trying to do.
translation.zh:
我们都想把自己在尝试做的事
做得非常出色

translation.en: And then you throw Adderall into the mix,
translation.zh: 于是你把阿得拉扔进饮料中

translation.en: and that lets you be the person that's there till midnight or 1:00.
translation.zh:
然后你就成了那种人
午夜甚至凌晨1点还在奋战

translation.en: [Eben] Let's go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: You guys know the drill. Give me a good base, a good knee bend.
translation.zh:
你们都了解套路了
下盘站稳 膝盖弯曲

translation.en: Pull that belly button to your spine, tighten that core up.
translation.zh: 收紧腹部 绷紧核心肌群

translation.en: The thing with football is you have to love it.
translation.zh: 打橄榄球的关键是你必须热爱它

translation.en: It's way too hard on your body, and your mind, really.
translation.zh: 它真的对体能和意志都是极大的挑战 （埃本 美国橄榄球联盟前球员）

translation.en: Go! Keep pushing it.
translation.zh: 开始！坚持住

translation.en: [announcer 1] Eben Britton, right here, a lot people are saying
translation.zh: 很多人都说埃本布里顿

translation.en: that may be the best offensive tackle in the country.
translation.zh: 那可能是全美最佳进攻截锋

translation.en: [announcer 2] Arizona has won their home opener.
translation.zh: 亚利桑那赢得了主场

translation.en: [Eben] There's nothing that can describe that.
translation.zh: 真是言语都无法形容

translation.en: That was the biggest win we've had in a long time.
translation.zh: 这是很久以来我们最大的胜利

translation.en: You don't make it to Division I football, period,
translation.zh: 要是无法逼自己使出超人的特长…

translation.en: if you can't push yourself to superhuman feats.
translation.zh: （布瑞特 埃本的妻子） …就没法打到第一级别的橄榄球赛上

translation.en: And then to make it to the NFL,
translation.zh: 为了打进美国橄榄球联盟

translation.en: that's like a 0.1% of every kid that's ever picked up a football.
translation.zh:
一千个拿过橄榄球的孩子里
只有一个能被选上

translation.en: [Eben] I don't know if there's a way to get to perfect,
translation.zh: 我不知道有没有办法做到完美

translation.en: but that's what you're always looking for.
translation.zh: 但你会去寻找这样的办法

translation.en: [Brit] I miss the rookie season. That was the drama-free, happy season.
translation.zh:
我想念新秀赛季
那是没有是非 只有快乐的一季

translation.en: [Eben] Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Man, I was kicking ass. I'm healthy, I'm strong, I'm quick.
translation.zh:
老天 我很牛啊
我健康、强壮、速度快

translation.en: I'm just building on the success that I had in my rookie year.
translation.zh: 我是靠着新秀年的成功过来的

translation.en: And we're in a workout, and we're doing squats,
translation.zh: 一次我们在训练 做下蹲

translation.en: and I went down, and I just feel this squirting.
translation.zh: 我蹲下去 有一种喷出的感觉

translation.en: It's like a tube of toothpaste, somebody just went like...
translation.zh: 就像牙膏管 有人这样…

translation.en: We started doing tests, and it's like, "Shit, it's a herniated disc. Clearly."
translation.zh:
我们开始做检查 发现
“该死 是椎间盘突出”

translation.en: Come on, don't step on those.
translation.zh: 行了 别踩上去

translation.en: I come back to training camp and the coaches were like,
translation.zh: 我回到训练营 教练们问

translation.en: "Dude, what the fuck happened to you?"
translation.zh: “老兄 你到底怎么了？”

translation.en: It doesn't matter if you're hurt or not. Every guy is hurt.
translation.zh: 你受不受伤不重要 人人都会受伤

translation.en: It's, "Can you get out there and play?"
translation.zh: 就是：“能上场去比赛吗？”

translation.en: Because there's always somebody coming behind you to take your job.
translation.zh:
因为你后面总是有人等着
夺走你的工作

translation.en: This Monday night game,
translation.zh: 那个周一晚上的比赛

translation.en: I was at this breaking point of exhaustion and frustration,
translation.zh: 疲惫和沮丧将我逼到了崩溃边缘

translation.en: and one of our teammates was like, "I got Adderall."
translation.zh: 然后有个队友说：“我有阿得拉”

translation.en: I took them, and I just felt jolted back to life.
translation.zh: 我服用了 我恢复了生气

translation.en: I felt this surge of energy rush through me.
translation.zh: 我感觉到一股能量从体内流过

translation.en: My mind came alive. My body felt alive.
translation.zh: 我的大脑活了 身体也有了动力

translation.en: I felt like I was able to get a jump on the snap count,
translation.zh: 我感觉倒计时的时候我还能跳起来

translation.en: and I was able to react faster than guys were,
translation.zh: 我可以比所有人反应都快

translation.en: and I could see things that were happening,
translation.zh: 我可以看到正在发生的一切

translation.en: like, corners blitzing...
translation.zh: 比如 角落闪电战…

translation.en: A stimulant is a drug that stimulates people.
translation.zh: 兴奋剂是一种能刺激人的药 （玛莎法拉赫博士 认知神经学家）

translation.en: It makes you feel more up and awake and alert.
translation.zh:
它会让你更觉更有能量
保持清醒和警惕

translation.en: And they also increase euphoria.
translation.zh: 也会提高人的愉悦感

translation.en: All of those things are very positive.
translation.zh: （卡尔哈特博士 心理系主任） 所有那些东西都非常积极

translation.en: That's why people have their caffeine in the morning.
translation.zh: 所有人们才会在早晨摄入咖啡因

translation.en: [Diller] So there's two main groups of stimulants.
translation.zh: 兴奋剂主要有两类

translation.en: There's amphetamine and methylphenidate.
translation.zh: 苯丙胺和哌醋甲酯

translation.en: Methylphenidate is the major constituent of Ritalin and Concerta,
translation.zh:
哌醋甲酯是利他林
和专注达的主要成分

translation.en: two drugs that are very, very widely used.
translation.zh: 这两种药的使用非常广泛

translation.en: And amphetamine is the major constituent of Adderall.
translation.zh: 苯丙胺是阿得拉的主要成分

translation.en: This whole class of medications that we think of stimulants
translation.zh: 我们认为是兴奋剂的整类药

translation.en: work on the catecholamine system in the brain.
translation.zh: 都作用于大脑的儿茶酚胺系统

translation.en: And there are two parts of the catecholamine system.
translation.zh: 儿茶酚胺系统主要有两个部分

translation.en: One is called norepinephrine, or colloquially sometimes
translation.zh:
一部分叫去甲肾上腺素
或者有时人们比较通俗地认为

translation.en: people think about that as noradrenaline or adrenaline.
translation.zh: 它就是正肾上腺素或肾上腺素

translation.en: And the other is dopamine.
translation.zh: 另一部分是多巴胺

translation.en: And what these drugs typically do in the brain is,
translation.zh: 这些药物在大脑中主要的作用是

translation.en: they either enhance the release of catecholamines
translation.zh: 要么提高儿茶酚胺的释放

translation.en: or they block its reuptake.
translation.zh: 要么阻止其被再吸收

translation.en: [Hinshaw] They increase reaction time,
translation.zh: 在紧张的体育竞赛中

translation.en: they probably increase some tolerance to pain
translation.zh: 这些药物会提高反应时间

translation.en: during the intensity of athletic competition.
translation.zh: 可能会提高对疼痛的忍受度

-和他的起司蛋糕

translation.en: It's so hard, minus all the ethical implications,

本来你知道只用花2美元

一方面 我觉得

translation.en: the only difference between these drugs

translation.en: is an additional methyl group on the methamphetamine compound.

甲基苯丙胺化合物中
是否有多余的甲基

translation.en: Methamphetamine is legal in the United States for prescription.

translation.en: It's a Schedule II drug, just like Adderall is a Schedule II drug.

但由于公众
对非法甲基苯丙胺的过度反应

translation.en: surrounding illicit methamphetamine.

translation.en: all within a negative context.

translation.en: that has similar effects.

有钱的孩子能接触到
纯化的药用兴奋剂

或者说加工过的甲基苯丙胺

translation.en: at the neuroreceptor sites, it has the exact same effects.

但在神经受体部位
它们具有相同的效果

translation.zh: 我身边都是生活优越的人

translation.en: These are wealthy people in America.

translation.en: where you can maximize everything.

就连协商医疗保健制度
和找合适的医生

他很正常 很健康

translation.en: I can write him whatever prescription he needs."

translation.en: I probably have six or seven friends that go to him currently.

帕洛阿尔托
半数的孩子都在服阿得拉”
