translation.en: Any of you guys currently on Adderall
translation.zh: 你们有没有谁服阿得拉的…

translation.en: and, you know, want to make $50?
translation.zh: （《硅谷群瞎传》） …想赚50美金？

translation.en: This is the generation beginning in the mid-'90s
translation.zh: 这一代人开始于上世纪90年代中期

translation.en: that was widely exposed to the use of Adderall and Ritalin and Concerta,
translation.zh:
他们接触的环境就是
同龄人大量使用阿得拉

translation.en: amongst their peers.
translation.zh: 利他林和专注达

translation.en: [Danny Brown singing] ♪ Scribbled in my notebook ♪ ♪ And never did homework ♪
translation.zh:
笔记本里潦潦草草
从来不做家庭作业

translation.en: ♪ Low attention span Guess these Adderall worked ♪
translation.zh:
注意力持续时间短
阿得拉可能有效果

translation.en: I'm not an MD, but it is possible for Ritalin to get you pretty high.
translation.zh:
我不是医学博士 但有可能是
利他林让你很嗨 （查理巴特利）

translation.en: That's probably what it is. It is a new medication.
translation.zh: 可能是这个原因 这是一种新药

translation.en: ♪ It is a new medication ♪
translation.zh: 这是一种新药

translation.en: -I'm afraid I'll have to expel your son. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 恐怕我必须开除你儿子了

translation.en: Unless you're willing to try a radical, untested, potentially dangerous--
translation.zh:
除非你愿意试一种前卫的
未经测试而且可能存在危险的…

translation.en: -Candy bar? -No. It's a new drug called Focusyn.
translation.zh:
-糖棒？
-不是 是一种叫“专注”的新药

translation.en: A drug?
translation.zh: 一种药？

translation.en: [Jasper] I learned about ADD after being on the medication,
translation.zh: 我服药后才了解注意力缺乏症

translation.en: so, I didn't know what it was.
translation.zh: 之前我不知道那是什么

translation.en: All I knew was it was for school.
translation.zh: 我只知道是为了上学服用的东西

translation.en: It was always just about being easier on the teachers
translation.zh: 因为服用后让老师更省心

translation.en: and being easier on my parents and just being not as loud.
translation.zh: 让父母更省心 不会那么吵闹

translation.en: And, I guess, focusing.
translation.zh: 还有就是有专注力

translation.en: But I never had interest in school,
translation.zh: 但我对学习从来不感兴趣

translation.en: and I focused in, always, what I wanted to focus in.
translation.zh: 我只专注于我想专注的事

translation.en: And that was art and, I guess,
translation.zh: 那就是艺术

translation.en: reading when I could read, which took some time.
translation.zh:
还有阅读 当然在我能阅读之后
培养这能力花了不少时间

translation.en: All right. Let's see, man. How's everything? How's the art?
translation.zh:
好 我们看看 哥们
一切怎么样？艺术怎么样？

translation.en: Good. I got to get ready to do my senior show this year show.
translation.zh: 挺好 我必须为今年的毕业秀做准备

translation.en: So I'm going to be keeping really, really busy.
translation.zh: 所以我会一直非常忙

translation.en: -How's it going with your medicines? -Good.
translation.zh:
-服药的情况如何？
-挺好

translation.en: Still taking 'em?
translation.zh: 还在服吗？

translation.en: Yeah, but not as much. I take them when I need them.
translation.zh:
对 但不是很多
我只在需要的时候服

translation.en: [doctor] Okay. So sporadically, like we've done before?
translation.zh: 好 像我们之前那样偶尔服用？

translation.en: Yeah. And I kind of think I would like to stop soon.
translation.zh: 对 我想我很快就可以停服了

translation.en: -Okay. Good. -Just stop altogether.
translation.zh:
-好 那很好
-完全停止

translation.en: Remember we talked about this is just developmental in the brain,
translation.zh:
记得我们说过
这只是大脑发育的过程

translation.en: and as you get more mature,
translation.zh: 一旦你变得更成熟了

translation.en: your brain grows more mature, those neurons start making connections.
translation.zh:
大脑也会更成熟
神经元就会相互接通

translation.en: Then you don't need to use them.
translation.zh: 那时候你就不需要服药了

translation.en: [Jasper] Yeah. I would like to be done with it. [doctor] Let's see.
translation.zh:
-好 我希望能够停止
-我们等着瞧

translation.en: -I've had enough since third grade. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-从三年级就开始 我服得够多了
-对

translation.en: [Jasper] Should I mash these tomatoes?
translation.zh: 我要把这些蕃茄弄碎吗？

translation.en: [Regina] Yeah, I'll help if you want.
translation.zh: 好 我可以帮忙的

translation.en: [Jasper] Yes. Do it by hand?
translation.zh: 好 用手弄？

translation.en: Just get in there, yeah. It says crush them by hand.
translation.zh: 手伸进去 对 上面说用手捏碎

translation.en: You're doing fine.
translation.zh: 你做得很好

translation.en: Go gentle. Gently.
translation.zh: 轻点 轻轻地

translation.en: [Jasper] I went to a Montessori school when I was younger,
translation.zh: 小时候 我跟我妹妹和表兄妹

translation.en: along with my sister and cousins.
translation.zh: 一起去上过蒙特梭利学校

translation.en: You wanna start slicing that? I'll do this.
translation.zh: 你要开始切片了吗？我来

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: [Jasper] They did well in those schools, and I didn't.
translation.zh: 他们学习都很好 就我不行

translation.en: When he was little, everybody else would know their alphabet and numbers.
translation.zh:
他小时候
其他人都认识字母和数字了

translation.en: And he couldn't necessarily identify a number from a letter.
translation.zh: （雷吉娜 哈斯佩尔的母亲） 他还分不清数字和字母

translation.en: -Sorry. -That's okay.
translation.zh:
-抱歉
-没事

translation.en: So, we had him tested, and they said that he had ADD.
translation.zh:
所以我们带他去检查
医生说他有注意力缺乏症

translation.en: So we moved him to another school that really...
translation.zh: （比尔 哈斯佩尔的父亲） 我们让他转到另一所学校…

translation.en: A very good school, very good.
translation.zh: 是非常好的学校

translation.en: [Regina] His third-grade teacher, halfway through the year,
translation.zh: 三年级读到一半的时候 他的老师说

translation.en: said something about him being on medication.
translation.zh: 他在服药

translation.en: I'm like, "Well, he's not on medication."
translation.zh: 我心想：“他没有服药啊”

translation.en: And she goes, "Everybody in this class is on medication."
translation.zh: 老师说：“这个班上的学生都服药”

translation.en: And I'm like, "He's not."
translation.zh: 我说：“他没有”

translation.en: She goes, "Well, I think that you might want to try it."
translation.zh: 她说：“我想你可能想试试”

translation.en: I was only there for two years before being prescribed Adderall.
translation.zh:
我才转过去两年
医生就给我开了阿得拉

translation.en: [Regina] It was definitely a hard decision
translation.zh: 这肯定是个艰难的决定

translation.en: because I was afraid it was gonna hurt his creativity.
translation.zh: 因为我害怕损坏他的创造力

translation.en: I mean, even at three, you could just see he had something.
translation.zh:
我想说 即便才三年级
你也可以看出他有些天赋

translation.en: I didn't want to ruin that.
translation.zh: 我不想毁了那种天赋

translation.en: I tried it, and there was a difference in him that
translation.zh: 我试了 不同的是

translation.en: was just able to concentrate more.
translation.zh: 他的注意力可以更集中了

translation.en: I tested it, because I wanted to see what it did.
translation.zh:
我也试服了一剂
因为我想知道这种药的效果

translation.en: And apparently, I have ADHD, too, because it worked.
translation.zh:
很显然 我也有注意力缺乏多动症
因为起作用了

translation.en: So, it just helps you concentrate.
translation.zh: 它能让我更专注

translation.en: So do you think I have ADD, or...
translation.zh: 你觉得我有多动症 还是…

translation.en: We won't know that until the Ritalin helps this concentration problem.
translation.zh:
在利他林帮你解决专注问题之前
我们还不得而知

translation.en: [Hinshaw] Not so many years ago, the medical profession thought,
translation.zh: 几年前 医学界还认为

translation.en: "Wait a minute. I'm not sure if this kid has ADHD or not.
translation.zh:
“等等 我不确定这孩子是否有
注意力缺乏多动症

translation.en: There's no definitive test. I'll give her a stimulant and see if it works.
translation.zh:
没有可以确定的检查
我会给她开兴奋剂 看是否起作用

translation.en: If it works, she has ADHD. If it doesn't, she doesn't."
translation.zh:
如果起作用了 她就是有注意力缺乏
多动症 不起作用就是没有”

translation.en: Interesting idea, probably wrong.
translation.zh: 很有趣的想法 但可能是错的

translation.en: Most everybody who takes a stimulant does focus better and longer,
translation.zh:
大多数人只要服了兴奋剂
注意力都会更集中、更持久

translation.en: can pull that all-nighter.
translation.zh: 可以通宵不睡

translation.en: [Jasper] I was being forced to take pills.
translation.zh: 我是曾经被迫服药

translation.en: That's the thing. I'm not doing it 'cause it's fun and stuff.
translation.zh:
关键就在这里
我不是因为好玩才服的

translation.en: I'm doing it 'cause I have to.
translation.zh: 是因为我不得不服用

translation.en: When I was in 9th grade, I was taking 50 milligrams a day.
translation.zh: 我上九年级时 每天服50毫克

translation.en: I'd get home from school still grinding my teeth, still wired.
translation.zh:
从学校回家
我还是磨着牙齿 极其兴奋

translation.en: I'd be up till 6:00 in the morning,
translation.zh: 到早上6点钟还没睡觉

translation.en: just painting in my room 'cause I'd still be wired from it.
translation.zh:
就在我的房间里画画
因为药劲还没有消退

translation.en: The only difference between children and adults, as far as I can see,
translation.zh: 服用这些药物时

translation.en: in the use of these medicines, is children don't like the higher doses.
translation.zh:
儿童和成人的唯一区别是
儿童不喜欢高剂量

translation.en: As they get higher, they say, "I feel nervous, I feel weird."
translation.zh:
药起作用后 他们会说
“我好紧张 感觉好奇怪”

translation.en: And something happens in mid adolescence, that the older adolescents
translation.zh:
到青春期中期出现了变化
青春期后期的人

translation.en: and adults will often say, "I feel powerful, I feel grand."
translation.zh:
和成年人经常会说
“我感觉很有力量 很强大”

translation.en: [Jasper] I was super embarrassed by it.
translation.zh: 我曾经觉得这很丢人

translation.en: When I started going to public school,
translation.zh: 我开始去上公共学校后

translation.en: it was like, "Yeah, I'm on medicine."
translation.zh: 感觉就像：“对 我在服药”

translation.en: I thought it was funny, just being like, "I have to take pills to calm down."
translation.zh:
我觉得很搞笑
“我必须服药才能冷静”

translation.en: I was always yelling upstairs,
translation.zh: 我总是在楼上大喊

translation.en: "Did you take your pills?"
translation.zh: “你吃药了吗？”

translation.en: Or, if he was not listening to me or behaving badly,
translation.zh:
或者 如果他不听我的话
或表现很差时

translation.en: I would also ask that question, which is probably
translation.zh: 我也会问那个问题

translation.en: more of the annoyance of why he picked up on that.
translation.zh: 也许因为这个 他才那么讨厌服药

translation.en: [Jasper] That's when I started writing stuff like "Take your pills."
translation.zh:
从那时候起我开始写
“吃药”之类的东西

translation.en: And trying to force myself
translation.zh: 试图强迫我自己

translation.en: to be proud of the fact that I can zone in on something
translation.zh:
为我能专注于某些事
而忽略其他所有事

translation.en: and completely ignore everything.
translation.zh: 而感到骄傲

translation.en: I started to be proud of it.
translation.zh: 我开始为此骄傲

translation.en: Getting up was the obsession.
translation.zh: 那种痴迷的感觉持续增强

translation.en: Just going around with people and being, "That's me."
translation.zh: 我到处跟人说：“是我画的”

translation.en: [Regina] They're just beautiful. Everything he does I love.
translation.zh: 他的作品很漂亮 都是我喜欢的

translation.en: [Jasper] The paintings don't really go with the idea of being on Adderall,
translation.zh: 除了其超级细致、超级准确

translation.en: except for just being super meticulous and super correct,
translation.zh: 以及不断重复的特点 这些作品其实

translation.en: and repeated over and over again.
translation.zh: 与服用阿得拉不太相关

translation.en: That's what I found to be the connection between that and my Adderall,
translation.zh:
我发现我的绘画
和阿得拉之间的联系

translation.en: was just the obsessiveness.
translation.zh: 就是一种执念

translation.en: [Ariana] Everyone says this. For some reason, everyone's like,
translation.zh: 不知为什么 人人都会说

translation.en: "Everyone has a little ADD."
translation.zh: “每个人都有点多动症”

translation.en: No, that's not true. We have distractions in our life,
translation.zh:
不是这样的 我们生活中有很多
让人分神的事物

translation.en: but not everyone has a brain that functions like somebody's with ADHD.
translation.zh:
但不是每个人的大脑
都像多动症的大脑那样

translation.en: One of my earliest memories is being diagnosed.
translation.zh:
我最早的记忆之一就是
被诊断有多动症

translation.en: It's pretty detrimental for people to constantly be saying things like that,
translation.zh: 人们经常那样说是有害的

translation.en: because it kind of illegitimizes... Is that a word?
translation.zh: 因为这样有点否认…是这个词吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] Illegitimizes the struggle
translation.zh: 否认注意力缺乏多动症

translation.en: and the actual power that ADHD might have over somebody's life.
translation.zh:
可能对某个人的生活
带来的挣扎和实际影响

translation.en: And it is a disorder.
translation.zh: 这是一种病

translation.en: It causes a lot of issues, and there's a stigma around it.
translation.zh: 它会引发很多问题 也有很多污名

translation.en: And I think that people throw it off
translation.zh: 我觉得有人像没事一样随便提起它

translation.en: like it's nothing and like everyone has a bit of it, but it's not true.
translation.zh:
好像人人都有点这种病
但事实并非如此

translation.en: [Blue] A lot of people out there think they have it because they can't focus.
translation.zh:
有很多人会觉得他们吃药
是因为无法专注

translation.en: But they really can't focus because society has just taught you not to focus.
translation.zh:
但他们无法专注
其实是因为社会教你不要专注

translation.en: We've become this one-minute society.
translation.zh: 我们现代的社会节奏非常快

translation.en: Everything is about shortening attention spans anyway.
translation.zh: 一切都是转瞬即逝的感觉

translation.en: So, society, overall, now has ADD.
translation.zh:
因此现在是整个社会都有了
注意力缺乏症

translation.en: So then, where's the line between those that actually were born with it,
translation.zh:
所以天生就有这种病的人
和在有这种病的社会中成长的人

translation.en: and those that have grown up in an ADD society.
translation.zh: 他们之前的界线在哪里

translation.en: I think that's where we really are right now.
translation.zh: 我想这就是当前的情况

translation.en: I try and stay out of the pool during photo shoots.
translation.zh: 拍照时我会尽量待在泳池外面

translation.en: -Nick looks like he's really struggling. -Man, a hard day's work.
translation.zh: 尼克好像挺挣扎的 老天 今天的工作累死了

translation.en: [laughing] It's a tough life today.
translation.zh: 今天真不好过

translation.en: I didn't have medication in mind when I went to the doctor.
translation.zh: 我去看医生时 并没有想要吃药

translation.en: I kind of knew that I had the signs of ADHD,
translation.zh: 我有点知道我有注意力缺乏症的症状

translation.en: just looking at peers, Russell Simmons,
translation.zh: 看看同龄人 拉塞尔西蒙斯

translation.en: and then I placed myself somewhere on that spectrum.
translation.zh: 然后把我自己放到那个范围内

translation.en: I talked to Russell a couple of times.
translation.zh: 我跟拉塞尔谈过好几次

translation.en: His answer was, "I don't take medicine. I do yoga."
translation.zh:
他的答案是
“我不吃药 我练瑜伽”

translation.en: And I went to yoga with him.
translation.zh: 我跟他去练瑜伽

translation.en: I was like, "I don't know if this is gonna get it done for me right now."
translation.zh:
我心想：“不知道这东西
对我有没有效果”

translation.en: Here we go.
translation.zh: 好啦

translation.en: [Maxine] We never had a discussion about his ADD as a child.
translation.zh:
他小时候我们从来没讨论过
他有多动症 （玛克辛 布卢的母亲）

translation.en: I didn't think he needed to have a label.
translation.zh: 我觉得他不需要有标签

translation.en: I think he needed to understand that he needed coping skills.
translation.zh:
我觉得他必须了解
他需要的是应对技巧

translation.en: She never took me to a doctor to even consider medication.
translation.zh:
她从来不带我去看医生
甚至没考虑过吃药

translation.en: She wanted me to learn how to function within the confines
translation.zh: 她希望我学会如何从当时的自己

translation.en: of what I was and who I was going to grow up to be.
translation.zh: 变成我长大想要成为的自己

translation.en: Shit, am I in the shot again? Am I in the shot again? My bad.
translation.zh: 该死 我又被拍了吗？我的错

translation.en: Having been a special ed teacher,
translation.zh: 作为一名特殊教育教师

translation.en: I've watched, to me,
translation.zh: 我一直在观察

translation.en: systemic administration of drugs to little black boys.
translation.zh: 对黑人小男孩的全身用药

translation.en: I know upon viewing that, I really did not want to...
translation.zh: 看到那种情景 我真不想…

translation.en: I must say black and Hispanic little boys.
translation.zh: 应该说是黑人和西班牙裔小男孩

translation.en: I knew that I did not want that for my child.
translation.zh: 我不想我的孩子也那样

translation.en: So it was not a happy moment when he announced that,
translation.zh: 所以在那么多年不用药之后

translation.en: after all those years of not using medication,
translation.zh: 他宣布他觉得自己必须吃药

translation.en: that he felt he needed to do that.
translation.zh: 那一刻我很不开心

translation.en: As a kid, I thought of Ritalin as what you put the crazy kids on.
translation.zh:
小时候 我以为利他林
是给疯小孩吃的

translation.en: Not knowing that I, technically, should I have been on it.
translation.zh: 我其实不知道我是否应该吃

translation.en: Everyone was to go on Ritalin and that was the instant cure.
translation.zh: 人人都吃利他林 因为它有即时疗效

translation.en: I didn't see it as instant cure, so I would never agree to it.
translation.zh:
我认为那不是即时疗效
所以我永远不会认同那种药

translation.en: Just ran him outside a lot.
translation.zh: 只是经常让他去外面跑

translation.en: Ritalin started as a love story.
translation.zh: 利他林始于一个爱情故事

translation.en: A scientist in Switzerland was fiddling around with compounds
translation.zh:
瑞典的一名科学家
在不务正业地摆弄化合物

translation.en: and things that were close to amphetamine.
translation.zh: 也就是相当于安非他命的东西

translation.en: He came up with something he thought might help his wife be more peppy,
translation.zh:
他弄出一些东西来
以为可能会让他妻子更活泼

translation.en: play better tennis, literally, and maybe keep her weight down.
translation.zh: 网球打得更好 或许还能让她减肥

translation.en: He was like, "There's really something to this."
translation.zh: 他心想：“这东西定有奇效”

translation.en: Her name, Marguerite. She was actually known as Rita,
translation.zh:
她的名字叫玛格丽特
别人都叫她“丽塔”

translation.en: and so he named it Ritaline.
translation.zh:
所以他给那种化合物
起名为“利他林恩”

translation.en: And it was only after Ciba, the Swiss company, put it on the market,
translation.zh: 在瑞士汽巴公司将它推上市后

translation.en: that they took off the '"E," and we now know it forever as Ritalin.
translation.zh:
把“恩”去掉了
之后就一直叫“利他林”

translation.en: [Conners] In the beginning,
translation.zh: 一开始

translation.en: we were completely enamored of the short term effect.
translation.zh: 我们完全被它的短期疗效迷住了

translation.en: There's nothing so gratifying
translation.zh:
（基思康纳斯博士
开展首次利他林研究） 没什么比这更令人愉悦的了

translation.en: as to have the parent come the day after you first give a pill
translation.zh:
就是你首次开出一片药后
第二天患者的父亲或母亲来了

translation.en: and say, you know, "I can't believe it.
translation.zh: 说：“我简直不敢相信

translation.en: He's actually... He's normal.
translation.zh: 他真的…他正常了

translation.en: He's a likable kid now."
translation.zh: 他现在是个好孩子了”

translation.en: Oh, you're such a good girl.
translation.zh: 你真是个好孩子

translation.en: [Schwarz] Keith Conners was a seminal figure in the history of ADHD.
translation.zh:
基思康纳斯是多动症研究史上
有重大影响的人物

translation.en: He developed the primary rating scale
translation.zh: 他发明了最初的评定量表

translation.en: that was used by doctors to help understand
translation.zh: 帮助医生用来理解

translation.en: the clinical picture in children.
translation.zh: 儿童的临床现象

translation.en: He worked on behalf of pharmaceutical companies evaluating new drugs.
translation.zh: 他曾代表制药公司评估新药

translation.en: Nobody knew anything about all this stuff.
translation.zh: 大家对这些事都一无所知

translation.en: These were difference makers in mental health.
translation.zh:
这些人对心理健康界
产生了重要影响

translation.en: What these doctors at Johns Hopkins were doing
translation.zh: 约翰霍普金斯的医生们

translation.en: was seeing if there was another pill
translation.zh:
则在研究除了安非他命
这种名声糟糕的药之外

translation.en: other than amphetamine, which had a terrible reputation,
translation.zh: 是否有另外一种药

translation.en: that might help these troubled children.
translation.zh: 可能帮助这些问题孩子

translation.en: Now, how are you going to get methylphenidate?
translation.zh: 你会怎么得到哌醋甲酯？

translation.en: The only way to get it is to ask Ciba for it,
translation.zh: 唯一的办法是跟瑞士的汽巴公司申请

translation.en: the Swiss company that marketed it.
translation.zh: 也就是销售这种药的公司

translation.en: They said, "Hey, Ciba, can we have a gazillion pills?"
translation.zh:
他们说：“嘿 汽巴
能给我们一匹药吗？”

translation.en: And this oil drum sized barrel of Ritalin pills
translation.zh: 整整一桶油桶大的利他林片

translation.en: ends up coming to Johns Hopkins so they can do their trials.
translation.zh:
最终来到约翰霍普金斯
让他们做试验

translation.en: [Conners] In those days it was possible to go to the principal and say,
translation.zh: 那时候 可以去找校长说

translation.en: "You know, we're trying out a new drug."
translation.zh: “我们要尝试一种新药”

translation.en: And he'd say, "Oh, my God,
translation.zh: 他会说：“噢 天

translation.en: if you could calm these little bastards down, it would be wonderful."
translation.zh:
你们要是能让那些小混蛋消停
那就太好了”

translation.en: We arranged a study on the spot
translation.zh: 我们安排了一次实地研究

translation.en: and did a two-week trial.
translation.zh: 做了两周的试验

translation.en: The children called the pills math pills.
translation.zh: 那些孩子管这种药叫数学药片

translation.en: Because, for the first time,
translation.zh: 因为那是第一次

translation.en: they were able to sit down and do sums and learn.
translation.zh: 他们能做坐下来做算术和学习

translation.en: The hyperactivity and inability to pay attention among children,
translation.zh: 孩子极度活跃 无法集中注意力

translation.en: has been understood for a long time.
translation.zh: 在长期以来都是被理解的

translation.en: That's the way some kids are.
translation.zh: 因为有些孩子天性使然

translation.en: And one of the first names was Minimal Brain Damage.
translation.zh: 最初的一个名头是“最小脑损伤”

translation.en: They assumed that there was some sort of damage to the brain.
translation.zh:
他们认为孩子的大脑
有或多或少的损伤

translation.en: Either in birth or encephalitis.
translation.zh: 可能是出生时造成 也可能是脑炎

translation.en: It became increasingly clear that that really wasn't the case.
translation.zh: 后来事实越来越清晰 不是那么回事

translation.en: They said, "How about minimal brain dysfunction?"
translation.zh: 他们说：“最小脑功能障碍如何？”

translation.en: It was only in 1980 that focus began, if you will,
translation.zh: 直到1980年 研究的焦点

translation.en: on the concept of inattention in children.
translation.zh:
才开始转到儿童注意力不集中
这一概念

translation.en: How about attention deficit disorder.
translation.zh: 注意力缺乏症如何？

translation.en: It had been rebranded as something that people were willing to accept.
translation.zh: 它已经更名为人们愿意接受的名称

translation.en: And people were willing to allow medication for.
translation.zh: 而且人们也愿意接受药物治疗

translation.en: [Rasmussen] In 1996, another company reintroduced, effectively, amphetamine,
translation.zh:
1996年 另一家公司重新有效地
引进了安非他命

translation.en: same old amphetamine, for attention deficit
translation.zh:
跟以前的安非他命一样
用于治疗注意力缺失

translation.en: on the US market as Adderall.
translation.zh: 引入到美国市场上 名叫阿得拉

translation.en: And it's grown to absolutely enormous proportions ever since then.
translation.zh:
从此这种药逐渐占据了
绝对巨大的市场份额

translation.en: The drug that became Adderall, its original name was Obetrol.
translation.zh:
阿得拉这种药原先的名称叫
奥博特罗尔

translation.en: A pharmaceutical businessman heard Obetrol was being used occasionally
translation.zh:
一名制药公司商人听说
奥博特罗尔偶尔被用于

translation.en: to treat what was at the time of course known as ADD.
translation.zh:
治疗当时称之为注意力缺乏症
即ADD的病

translation.en: And he's like, "ADD, all, Adderall."
translation.zh:
于是他说：“ADD all
Adderall” 音译即阿得拉

translation.en: That's where the name came from.
translation.zh: 这就是阿得拉名称的由来

translation.en: One of the interesting phenomenas for me is listening to experts
translation.zh: 我觉得其中一个有趣的现象是

translation.en: who were on the ground floor of this.
translation.zh: 听听当年创始的专家怎么说

translation.en: People like Keith Conners,
translation.zh: 像基思康纳斯他们

translation.en: now having major questions and regrets about the outcomes of what they had done.
translation.zh:
对他们所做作为造成的结果
即抱有疑问 也有遗憾

translation.en: The medicalizing of everyday life,
translation.zh: 日常生活的医疗化

translation.en: that everybody could potentially have a disorder,
translation.zh: 人人都可能有某种障碍

translation.en: ultimately trivializes the entire process,
translation.zh: 最终淡化了整个过程

translation.en: and also puts the whole society in the hands of doctors and Big Pharma.
translation.zh:
也将整个社会置于
医生和大制药公司手中

translation.en: [interviewer] Would you include yourself as being in the ADHD business?
translation.zh:
你会把自己算作
注意力缺乏多动症产业的一员吗？

translation.en: Or having been at one point?
translation.zh: 或者曾经一度是？

translation.en: I think I was in the ADHD business,
translation.zh: 我觉得我曾置身于这个产业中

translation.en: and I wasn't really cognizant of how much I was in that business.
translation.zh: 我只是没有认识到我有多深入

translation.en: Uh, there are big bucks waiting for doctors
translation.zh: 有很多钱等着医生赚

translation.en: who file patients through quickly and give them prescriptions
translation.zh: 他们快速开处方就可以把病人归档

translation.en: without knowing what the down effects are going to be.
translation.zh: 而不知道会带来怎样的涟漪效应

translation.en: Some of which are good, but some of which are quite bad.
translation.zh: 有的是好的 但有的很不好

translation.en: The United States also is one of only two developed nations
translation.zh: 美国是允许直接向消费者广告… （新西兰 美国）

translation.en: that allows the direct to consumer advertising
translation.zh: …受控药物的

translation.en: of controlled substances.
translation.zh: 两大发达国家之一

translation.en: So when it came to ADHD drugs,
translation.zh: 说到注意力缺乏多动症药

translation.en: it wasn't just for children who are hyperactive,
translation.zh: 它不仅仅是针对极度活跃的

translation.en: who can't concentrate in school.
translation.zh: 在学校无法集中注意力的儿童

translation.en: What they wanted to do is make the mothers more comfortable.
translation.zh: 他们想做的是让妈妈们更舒服

translation.en: "Oh, my goodness, my kid now takes out the garbage!
translation.zh:
“噢 我的天
我的孩子现在会倒垃圾了！

translation.en: What a wonderful world, thanks to Adderall XR."
translation.zh: 感谢阿得拉XR 世界太美好”

translation.en: Every mother is going to be seduced by an ad
translation.zh: 每位妈妈都会被广告引诱… （与孩子智慧相符的作业）

translation.en: that appears to promise better grades in a pill
translation.zh:
…这种广告似乎保证了
一片药就能提高成绩

translation.en: and better grades in a diagnosis.
translation.zh: 一次诊断就能提高成绩

translation.en: It was grotesque what these companies did in the pursuit of profit.
translation.zh:
为了追求利益
这些公司的所作所为非常荒唐

translation.en: [Hebert] Give it up. Hey, man, thank y'all for coming out.
translation.zh: 欢迎啊 嘿 哥们 感谢你们出来

translation.en: Good to see you. You all right? Good to see you.
translation.zh: 很高兴见到你们 你们好吗？

translation.en: My name is Dr. Corey Hebert and I have a lot of stuff going on.
translation.zh:
我是科里赫伯特医生
我有很多事情要做 （科里赫伯特医生 儿科医生）

translation.en: But I am a physician first.
translation.zh: 但我首先是个医生

translation.en: I'm back. It's me, the doctor for the people.
translation.zh: 我回来了 是我 大家的医生

translation.en: You got to get rid of your stress. It's killing you.
translation.zh: 你们必须摆脱压力 压力会害死人

translation.en: Seeing patient to patient to patient to patient,
translation.zh: 看了一个又一个的病人

translation.en: at the end of the day, I've changed 30 people's lives
translation.zh:
一天下来
我已经改变了30个人的人生

translation.en: and maybe their family.
translation.zh: 或许还有他们的家庭

translation.en: But when I'm in the media, I'm talking to a million people at one time.
translation.zh:
但是在媒体上
我一次可以跟一百万人对话

translation.en: Dr. Corey Hebert is an ER physician at the LSU Health Sciences Center.
translation.zh:
科里赫伯特医生是新奥尔良
LSU健康科学中心的急诊医生

translation.en: [Hebert] The way a child sees himself
translation.zh: 儿童看待自己的方式

translation.en: and how a child learns to cope in the world,
translation.zh: 他们学习应付这个世界的方式

translation.en: along with his self-esteem and confidence,
translation.zh: 以及他们的自尊心和自信心

translation.en: is just as important to his success as his physical health,
translation.zh: 对他成功的重要性和身体健康一样

translation.en: because ADHD is a medical problem.
translation.zh: 因为注意力缺乏多动症是个医学问题

translation.en: My brother. Good to see you. How you been?
translation.zh: 兄弟 很高兴见到你 还好吗？

translation.en: -Good. -You're looking good.
translation.zh:
-挺好
-看着你气色不错

translation.en: I'm going to make my patients do well, and they're going to be successful
translation.zh:
我要利用我拥有的所有工具
让我的患者恢复健康

translation.en: with all the tools that I have in my arsenal.
translation.zh: 而且他们会取得成功

translation.en: And that's the bottom line. I have to do that.
translation.zh: 那是底线 我必须那样做

translation.en: And I know some people say,
translation.zh: 我知道有些人说

translation.en: "Well, maybe you should not use medicines as much."
translation.zh: “或许你不应该用那么多药”

translation.en: Well, come sit in my chair.
translation.zh: 那你来坐我的位置试试

translation.en: What you must do is make the correct diagnosis,
translation.zh: 你必须做的是正确的诊断

translation.en: not over diagnose and not over medicate.
translation.zh: 而不是过度诊断和过度用药

translation.en: -Tell me how school's going. -It's going all right.
translation.zh:
-告诉我在学校怎么样
-挺好的

translation.en: "All right"? What does that mean, "All right"?
translation.zh: （拉谢姆 高中学生） “挺好”是什么意思？

translation.en: Are you making A's, you making B's, you making C's?
translation.zh: 你得了A 得了B 还是得了C？

translation.en: [Sherry] The part I like, he don't talk to him as if he's his doctor.
translation.zh:
我喜欢的是他不是像医生一样
跟他交谈

translation.en: He talks to him like he cares.
translation.zh: 而是很关心地跟他讲话

translation.en: All the doctors we had, it's go in,
translation.zh: 我们以前所有的医生都一样

translation.en: they check everything and write an appointment.
translation.zh: 他们会检查所有东西 然后写个预约

translation.en: "We'll see you back here in four weeks."
translation.zh: “我们四周后还在这里见”

translation.en: But with Dr. Hebert, it's not like that.
translation.zh: 但赫伯特医生不是那样

translation.en: What about side effects from the medicine?
translation.zh: 你有没有感到什么药性副作用？

translation.en: You been feeling tired? Tell me what you've been feeling.
translation.zh:
比如一直感觉累？
告诉我你最近的感觉

translation.en: -No. -No.
translation.zh:
-没有
-没有

translation.en: Stomach ache, headache, anything like that?
translation.zh: 胃疼、头疼 有吗？

translation.en: -Headaches. Yeah. -You get headaches?
translation.zh:
-头疼 对
-你有过头疼？

translation.en: How often are you getting them?
translation.zh: 多久疼一次？

translation.en: He was diagnosed with ADD when he was six.
translation.zh:
他六岁时就被诊断出
患有注意力缺乏症

translation.en: And I heard all the stigma,
translation.zh: 我听说了各种传言

translation.en: how the medication make the children feel.
translation.zh: 药物让孩子感觉如何如何的

translation.en: For two years, I went without giving him medication.
translation.zh: 两年来 我都不让他吃药

translation.en: We tried therapy and everything, and nothing would work.
translation.zh: 我们尝试了理疗等等 但都没用

translation.en: He actually had to repeat kindergarten.
translation.zh: 他幼儿园就不得不留级

translation.en: Were you taking your medicine and then suddenly stopped taking it?
translation.zh: 你服药期间会突然停服吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Come on, man, you're killing me. You're killing me.
translation.zh: 好了 哥们 你害死我了

translation.en: When you started taking it again, you started to get headaches.
translation.zh: 你再次开始服用后 就会开始头疼

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay, I'm glad.
translation.zh:
-对
-好 我很高兴

translation.en: You got to tell me this stuff.
translation.zh: 你必须实话实说

translation.en: The first set of meds, I didn't like the way it had him at all.
translation.zh: 第一组药 我不喜欢那种效果

translation.en: Wouldn't talk, wouldn't eat, couldn't sleep.
translation.zh: 不说话 不吃饭 无法入睡

translation.en: He already don't say much anyways. So we got Adderall.
translation.zh:
他已经不怎么说话了
所以我们服用阿得拉

translation.en: When he first started school, he was taking it every day
translation.zh: 他开始上学后 每天都服

translation.en: and he had 2.53,
translation.zh: 他的平均成绩是2点53

translation.en: and now his grades are dropping...
translation.zh: 现在成绩下降了

translation.en: 'cause he don't take his meds.
translation.zh: 因为他没有服药

translation.en: But he's at the age where I won't force him to take it,
translation.zh:
但他这个年纪
我是不会强迫他服药的

translation.en: 'cause he knows the difference, and he's in high school.
translation.zh: 因为他知道区别 他上高中了

translation.en: If those are the consequences he want to deal with, that's on him.
translation.zh:
如果这些是他想应对的后果
那就随他吧

translation.en: But I don't like the effects of it sometimes, either.
translation.zh: 但有时候我也不喜欢那种效果

translation.en: Y'all good to go.
translation.zh: 检查完了 你们可以走了

translation.en: If a child has ADHD,
translation.zh: 如果孩子患有注意力缺乏症

translation.en: we'll do whatever it takes to get them to the next level.
translation.zh:
我们会竭尽所能帮他们
到达另一阶段

translation.en: Whether it be medicine, therapy or some other intervention.
translation.zh:
无论是药物治疗、理疗
或其他干预治疗

translation.en: But something must happen.
translation.zh: 但必须采取措施

translation.en: [Sherry] I was the first in my family to graduate from high school.
translation.zh: 我是家里第一个读到高中毕业的人

translation.en: And I always tell my kids, "I don't want you to be like me.
translation.zh:
我总是告诉孩子们
“我不希望你们像我一样

translation.en: I want you to be better than me.
translation.zh: 我希望你们比我强

translation.en: So because I have a master's degree, then I want you to get a doctorate.
translation.zh:
也就是说 如果我是硕士学位
我希望你们拿博士学位

translation.en: I want to be able to call you Dr. King."
translation.zh: 我希望能叫你们金博士”

translation.en: -That's him right there. -[indistinct shouting]
translation.zh: 那就是他

translation.en: That's my baby. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是我的孩子

translation.en: When he's not on his meds,
translation.zh: 他不吃药时

translation.en: he reacts and does things without thinking about the consequences.
translation.zh: 他的表现的行为都不计后果

translation.en: He knows that he should take them,
translation.zh: 他知道他应该服药

translation.en: it's that he don't like the side effects to them.
translation.zh: 只是他不喜欢其副作用

translation.en: He won't take it Friday and Saturday or Sunday.
translation.zh: 他周五和周六或周天不服

translation.en: If he takes it Monday, it slows him down completely,
translation.zh: 如果他周一服药 行动会完全慢下来

translation.en: almost to zombie state.
translation.zh: 几乎是僵尸的状态

translation.en: A lot of his friends don't have to deal with that.
translation.zh: 他的很多朋友不需要应对那些问题

translation.en: So it makes him feel like he's not normal.
translation.zh: 所以让他觉得自己不正常

translation.en: So he'd just rather not take it.
translation.zh: 所以他宁愿不服药

translation.en: [interviewer] What was the research you were able to do about Adderall?
translation.zh: 你针对阿得拉做了些什么研究？

translation.en: [Regina] I went to the doctor, we tried one medicine, it didn't work,
translation.zh:
我去看医生
我们试了一种药 不管用

translation.en: and then we tried this and I saw a difference immediately.
translation.zh:
然后试了这种药
马上就见到不同的效果了

translation.en: Come into my shop.
translation.zh: 到我店里来

translation.en: [Regina] Did I do research?
translation.zh: 我做过研究吗？

translation.en: Shamefully, no.
translation.zh: 很惭愧 没有

translation.en: [interviewer] But you were acting on the guidance of...
translation.zh: 但你的行为是有人指导的

translation.en: The psychologist, the doctor, I guess, his pediatrician.
translation.zh:
心理学家、医生的指导
他的儿科医生

translation.en: I guess, the teachers at school.
translation.zh: 还有学校老师

translation.en: My sister, whose kid was on Ritalin.
translation.zh: 我妹妹的孩子也服用过利他林

translation.en: I don't know if I would have done it. Now, I google how to open a can.
translation.zh:
我不知道换了现在我能否会先调研
现在 我连开罐头都要谷歌一下

translation.en: I google everything.
translation.zh: 什么都要上谷歌搜索

translation.en: But then, I don't know that I would even have thought to do that.
translation.zh:
可那个时候 我不知道自己
有没有想到过要那样做

translation.en: [Jasper] I got to school and I stopped taking it so much.
translation.zh: 我上了学 但不再服那么多药

translation.en: I only take it when I write, really.
translation.zh: 我只在写作时服用

translation.en: This isn't pot and booze.
translation.zh: 这不是大麻和酒精

translation.en: This is meth and it's screwing with your liver.
translation.zh: 这是甲基苯丙胺 会伤肝的

translation.en: When I was in senior year, I wasn't allowed to drink or anything
translation.zh: 我上大四时 还不准喝酒之类的

translation.en: because they were worried it was shutting down.
translation.zh: 因为他们担心会损坏肝功能

translation.en: My blood work wasn't looking good. There was too many enzymes or something.
translation.zh:
我的血液检查结果不是很好
有太多酶之类的

translation.en: I had to constantly be looking at my poop to see what color it was.
translation.zh:
我必须经常查看我的大便
看看颜色如何

translation.en: If that's the case, then this isn't worth it.
translation.zh: 如果是那样 服药真不值得

translation.en: So what do we know about the safety issues with stimulants?
translation.zh:
关于兴奋剂的安全性
我们知道些什么呢？

translation.en: There are cardiovascular risks.
translation.zh: 有心血管危险

translation.en: There's also a risk of a psychotic episode,
translation.zh: 也有精神病发作的风险

translation.en: even for people who don't have a history of psychosis.
translation.zh: 甚至对没有精神病历史的人也如此

translation.en: There's a risk of addiction, long-term.
translation.zh: 有长期上瘾的风险

translation.en: People can become dependent on these drugs,
translation.zh: 人们会变得依赖这些药物

translation.en: and that's, you know, a horrible fate.
translation.zh: 那是很可怕的

translation.en: You wouldn't wish that on your worst enemy.
translation.zh:
哪怕是你最痛恨的敌人
你也不希望他药物上瘾

translation.en: [Peter] Whether they realize it or not,
translation.zh: 无论他们是否意识到

translation.en: they're banking on the fact that we take Adderall.
translation.zh: 他们都依靠我们服用阿得拉赚钱

translation.en: The perfect employee at an investment bank
translation.zh: 投资银行的完美员工

translation.en: or the perfect employee at a tech firm is somebody that doesn't say no.
translation.zh:
或者科技公司的完美员工
是不会说“不”的

translation.en: There is a culture of, "You do stay up 16 hours for seven days straight."
translation.zh:
有一种文化是
“连续七天16小时不睡觉”

translation.en: If the kid to your right and the kid to your left are producing these outputs,
translation.zh:
如果你左边和右边的孩子
有这些成果

translation.en: then you should be able to produce them.
translation.zh: 那你也应该有

translation.en: But if they are taking Adderall,
translation.zh: 如果他们服用阿得拉

translation.en: then you should probably be taking Adderall.
translation.zh: 那很有可能你也该服用阿得拉

translation.en: I was coming out of a particularly rough few weeks of work.
translation.zh: 我刚结束了数周非常辛苦的工作

translation.en: I was working with a notorious asshole on Wall Street.
translation.zh:
我跟华尔街
一个臭名昭著的的混蛋合作

translation.en: He had another analyst and myself working around the clock.
translation.zh:
他有另一名分析师和我自己
没日没夜地替他干

translation.en: And we were up for two and a half days doing Adderall.
translation.zh: 靠着阿得拉 我们两天半没睡觉

translation.en: We present all this work that we'd been doing to the managing director.
translation.zh: 我们把所有工作呈递给总经理看

translation.en: And he flips through it and immediately starts saying,
translation.zh: 他随便翻了翻 很快就开始说

translation.en: "Wait, this isn't what I asked for. I actually need this, this and this."
translation.zh:
“等等 这不是我要的
我要的是这个和这个”

translation.en: I turned to this guy in my impaired state, and I said,
translation.zh:
我在累得半死的状态下转向那家伙
对他说

translation.en: "Fuck you. This is exactly what you asked for."
translation.zh: “去死吧 这正是你当初要的”

translation.en: And so the next day, I go into work, keep my head down low,
translation.zh: 第二天我低着头去上班

translation.en: and the associate comes over to me.
translation.zh: 同事走向我

translation.en: He goes, "Did you hear what happened last night?
translation.zh: 他问：“你听说昨晚的事了吗？

translation.en: About two or three hours after you left the office,
translation.zh: 你离开办公室两三个小时后

translation.en: the other analyst that you'd been working with had a seizure from exhaustion,
translation.zh:
你合作的另一名分析师
因为过度疲劳突发癫痫

translation.en: and he's in the hospital right now."
translation.zh: 他现在住进医院了”

translation.en: I immediately go and call him.
translation.zh: 我立马给他打电话

translation.en: He picks up the phone and I ask him how he is,
translation.zh: 他拿起电话 我问他情况如何

translation.en: and he says, "My parents are trying to make me quit.
translation.zh: 他说：“我父母想让我辞职

translation.en: My parents think that enough is enough.
translation.zh: 我父母觉得实在是够了

translation.en: But can you send me this file? I'm being asked for it."
translation.zh:
但你可以把这个文件发个我吗？
上面要求我处理”

translation.en: [Delaney] When I was in high school, everyone told me,
translation.zh: 我上高中时 人人都告诉我

translation.en: "You'll love college.
translation.zh: “你会喜欢大学的

translation.en: You'll finally be able to take classes that you enjoy."
translation.zh: 你终于可以选择自己喜欢上的课了”

translation.en: I like business, but it doesn't feed my soul.
translation.zh: 我喜欢商务 但它喂不饱我的灵魂

translation.en: I take it because it's relevant.
translation.zh: 我选择它是因为它相关

translation.en: Stimulants are generally gonna help people a lot before they hurt them.
translation.zh: 兴奋剂会先帮助人 然后再伤人

translation.en: They gave them to pilots in World War II.
translation.zh: 二战时他们给飞行员服用

translation.en: It will give you something that you want in the short term,
translation.zh: 它短期内会给你预期的效果

translation.en: and so then you're primed that a pill is going to give me what I want.
translation.zh:
所以你会认为一片药
就能让我得到想要的东西

translation.en: "That medicine helped me study,
translation.zh: “那种药帮助我学习

translation.en: and I did much better than I would have without it.
translation.zh: 我的成绩比没有服药前进步好多

translation.en: I'm gonna do it again."
translation.zh: 我还会再次服用的”

translation.en: And then, "Now I can't sleep. Does anybody have anything for sleep?"
translation.zh:
然后就是“我现在睡不着
谁有助眠的药？”

translation.en: People need to understand that if you abuse the stimulants,
translation.zh: 人们必须清楚如果自己滥用兴奋剂…

translation.en: and young people do,
translation.zh: 年轻人确实在滥用

translation.en: we've had many patients that is their drug of choice.
translation.zh:
我们有很多病人
就是主动服用兴奋剂的

translation.en: They tend to pair them with something that's a downer, like alcohol.
translation.zh:
他们倾向于把它和镇定剂一起服用
比如酒精

translation.en: It's easy to have an alcohol overdose if you're on stimulants
translation.zh:
如果你在服用兴奋剂
很容易酒精过量

translation.en: because you'll be able to drink a lot more,
translation.zh: 因为你会喝得更多

translation.en: and then the stimulants wear off and you're in a blackout.
translation.zh:
然后兴奋剂效果消退了
你会短暂失忆

translation.en: People use it for work, and so they think it's okay.
translation.zh:
人们为了工作而服药
所以他们认为没什么问题

translation.en: I have friends that have gotten to the point
translation.zh: 我有的朋友已经到了

translation.en: where they can't really do work without taking Adderall.
translation.zh: 不服用阿得拉就没法工作的地步

translation.en: You get used to it, and then you can't do work without it.
translation.zh: 你会习惯它 然后不吃药就没法工作

translation.en: You can't be productive. I've seen that happen to people.
translation.zh: 你会变得没有效率 我见过有人这样

translation.en: Most people can use amphetamine without becoming addicted.
translation.zh: 很多人服用安非他命不会上瘾

translation.en: But ultimately, too large a group of people become addicted,
translation.zh: 但最终 很多人还是会上瘾

translation.en: so it becomes unacceptable for the society to put this much speed out there.
translation.zh:
所以社会上有太多兴奋剂
就变得不可接受

translation.en: And we're absolutely in one of those growing waves right now.
translation.zh: 我们现在正处于这种风口浪尖上

translation.en: Those of us on the front line have been feeling this for about eight to ten years.
translation.zh:
我们在第一线的那些人
有这种感觉已经八到十年了

translation.en: And right at the moment,
translation.zh: 现在呢

translation.en: the doctor-prescribed opiate abuse epidemic is taking center stage,
translation.zh:
医生开处方的阿片剂滥现象
正在占据主要地位

translation.en: but I'm telling you, Adderall is right below
translation.zh: 但我告诉你们 阿得拉

translation.en: the threshold of the opiates.
translation.zh: 就排在阿片剂的下面

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you start to attribute success to the Adderall?
translation.zh: 你开始把成功归因于阿得拉了吗？

translation.en: I really struggled with not, "Am I cheating?"
translation.zh:
我很纠结
不是纠结“我这算作弊吗？”

translation.en: But, "Is this really me anymore?"
translation.zh: 而是“这还是我吗？”

translation.en: Should I still feel as good about accomplishing something
translation.zh:
知道自己是服用了阿得拉
而且确实是这种药帮我集中注意力

translation.en: knowing that I took Adderall and that really helped me
translation.zh: 让我免于疼痛或疲惫的纠缠

translation.en: focus on getting it done,
translation.zh: 我还应该为取得的成绩

translation.en: rather than struggling through my pain or exhaustion.
translation.zh: 自我感觉良好吗？

translation.en: Especially after I started getting these injuries.
translation.zh: 尤其是在我受伤之后

translation.en: Dislocated shoulder, herniated disk in my back,
translation.zh: 肩膀脱臼 背部椎间盘突出

translation.en: L5-S1, torn MCL, torn hamstrings, torn quads, had my bell rung.
translation.zh:
L5-S1 内侧副韧带拉伤
蹄筋拉伤 股四头肌拉伤 头部撞伤

translation.en: Adderall helped lift me out of that.
translation.zh: 阿得拉帮我摆脱了伤痛

translation.en: The problem was, that really productive feeling,
translation.zh: 问题是 那种高效率的感觉

translation.en: and feeling like I'd conquered the world that day,
translation.zh: 我当天就能征服全世界的感觉

translation.en: it would fall off into this black spiral, into a depression, and into...
translation.zh:
会跌入黑色的旋涡
会让我抑郁 会让我…

translation.en: It was a crash.
translation.zh: 就像坠落的感觉

translation.en: I'd start crashing off of it, so then I'd take more.
translation.zh: 开始坠落了 我就开始服用更多

translation.en: A 70 milligram time release in the morning
translation.zh: 早上服70毫克长效型

translation.en: and then supplementing a couple 20 milligrams
translation.zh: 然后一天下来再补充几片

translation.en: in there throughout the day.
translation.zh: 20毫克的

translation.en: That crash doesn't really go away when you take more.
translation.zh: 你服的越多 坠落感并不会消失

translation.en: You spike up and then you're dipping back down into the crash.
translation.zh: 你升到高空 然后还是会坠入深渊

translation.en: It would be an exhaustion thing.
translation.zh: 这会让人很疲惫

translation.en: Like, you're running, but your body isn't going anywhere.
translation.zh:
比如 你在跑步
但你的身体根本动不了

translation.en: You start to float away from yourself in a way.
translation.zh: 在某种程度上 你开始游离

translation.en: [Blue] If you're feeling depressed and you stop taking Adderall,
translation.zh: 如果你感到压抑 停止服用阿得拉

translation.en: it can lead to the depression more.
translation.zh: 会让你更抑郁

translation.en: That might just be me.
translation.zh: 我可能就是这样

translation.en: Sometimes when you're not on it,
translation.zh: 有时候你没服药

translation.en: it's easy to get into your head and just get lost in that space.
translation.zh: 抑郁就会袭来 我会迷失在那空间里

translation.en: [Leigh] It bums me out to know I didn't do it myself.
translation.zh:
这不是我自己造成的
而是我和阿得拉一起造成的

translation.en: Me and the Adderall did it.
translation.zh: 意识到这点 我很难过

translation.en: It's definitely a competition with yourself.
translation.zh: 这绝对是你与自己的竞争

translation.en: [Jasper] It was definitely an identity crisis, coming off of it.
translation.zh: 这绝对是阿得拉引发的身份危机

translation.en: I will say, me being on it and me being off of it
translation.zh:
我会说 一个是服了药的我
一个是没服药的我

translation.en: is like two completely different people.
translation.zh: 像是两个完全不同的人

translation.en: Like, very different people.
translation.zh: 非常不同的人

translation.en: [player 1] Red three!
translation.zh: 红队三分！

translation.en: [player 2] Halfway home.
translation.zh: 离终点还有一半

translation.en: [Eben] Because it's an amphetamine and it speeds up your metabolism,
translation.zh:
因为它是一种苯丙胺
会加速你的新陈代谢

translation.en: it dries you out, it dehydrates your muscles and tissue,
translation.zh: 会让你丧失水分 让肌肉和组织脱水

translation.en: so you become more prone to injury.
translation.zh: 所以你会更容易受伤

translation.en: So that became a real challenge as well,
translation.zh: 所以在服药期间保持水分

translation.en: staying hydrated through the use.
translation.zh: 也是一种真正的挑战

translation.en: I really believed he had ADD.
translation.zh: 我确实相信他有注意力缺乏症

translation.en: It seemed like his was a medical issue that was being treated.
translation.zh: 好像他的医疗问题已经被治愈了

translation.en: Whereas any time I had used Adderall to study
translation.zh: 然而 每次我为了学习而服用阿得拉

translation.en: or anyone I knew had used Adderall to study,
translation.zh:
或者我认识的人
为了学习而服用阿得拉

translation.en: I looked at it as basically, abuse. Substance abuse.
translation.zh: 我基本上都认为是滥用 药物滥用

translation.en: But I didn't look at it that way until later,
translation.zh: 但一开始我没这么认为 直到后来

translation.en: when I realized how much he was taking.
translation.zh: 就在我意识到他服了多少之后

translation.en: And then, when I started to also feel like his sleep was being affected
translation.zh: 后来 我感觉他的睡眠受到了影响

translation.en: and he was maybe using other substances to help him sleep,
translation.zh: 他可能还服用其他助眠药

translation.en: I started thinking, "That's not a great cycle."
translation.zh:
我就开始想
“这不是一种好的循环”

translation.en: [Eben] My prescription for Adderall and Vyvanse had run out.
translation.zh:
我的甲磺赖氨酸安非他命
和阿得拉处方已经过期了

translation.en: And on a day I didn't have it, I took a Ritalin.
translation.zh: 没有阿得拉吃的那天 我服了利他林

translation.en: They both treat ADD/ADHD.
translation.zh: 两种药都是治多动症的

translation.en: That's what I have a therapeutic use exemption for Adderall for.
translation.zh:
正因为这种病 我才获得
治疗用途豁免 才能服阿得拉

translation.en: "It'll be the same thing. It should be fine."
translation.zh:
“两种药治的病都一样
应该没问题”

translation.en: So of course the day I took the Ritalin, I took a drug test, failed it.
translation.zh:
所以我服了利他林那天
我去做药检 当然没通过

translation.en: They viewed it as two different compounds, completely.
translation.zh: 他们认为那是两种完全不同的化合物

translation.en: And I was hit with a four-game suspension.
translation.zh: 我被罚停赛四场

translation.en: [George Stephanopoulos] This morning, America's golden girl targeted.
translation.zh: 今早 美国的金牌女孩成了焦点

translation.en: [announcer] She's just got so much power.
translation.zh: 她太有力量了

translation.en: [Stephanopoulos] The leaked documents reveal
translation.zh: 泄露出来的文件显示

translation.en: 19-year-old Biles tested positive for methylphenidate.
translation.zh:
19岁的西蒙妮拜尔斯药检呈阳性
她服用过哌醋甲酯

translation.en: [reporter] Simone was upfront about taking the drugs
translation.zh: 西蒙妮坦白自己服过药

translation.en: and was given a therapeutic use exemption for the medication she takes.
translation.zh: 因为她在服药 所以有治疗用途豁免

translation.en: [Stephanopoulos] And one other decorated Olympian has grappled with ADHD, Michael Phelps.
translation.zh:
另一位奥运奖牌得主迈克尔菲尔普斯
也在跟注意力缺乏多动症抗争

translation.en: But some people are now asking
translation.zh: 但现在有人质疑

translation.en: if those drugs gave her an unfair leg-up at the Olympics.
translation.zh:
那些药是否在奥运会中
给了她不公平的援助

translation.en: [Hinshaw] We've arrived at the land of controversy.
translation.zh: 我们已经到了争议的地步

translation.en: Should everybody get SAT tutors?
translation.zh: 人人都应该有高考家教？

translation.en: That's enhancing performance, but only certain families can afford it.
translation.zh:
那是为了提高成绩
但只有某些家庭请得起

translation.en: Should everybody drink coffee?
translation.zh: 人人都应该喝咖啡？

translation.en: This goes way beyond psychiatry or clinical psychology.
translation.zh:
这已经超出精神病学
或临床心理学的范畴

translation.en: It goes way beyond mental health.
translation.zh: 也超出了心理健康范畴

translation.en: What's a level playing field?
translation.zh: 哪种情况算公平竞争？

translation.en: Stimulants and ADHD are in the middle of that playing field.
translation.zh:
兴奋剂和注意力缺乏多动症
就横在公平竞争中间

translation.en: If we play our cards right,
translation.zh: 如果我们利用得当

translation.en: we're going to have to bring ADHD, mental health stigma,
translation.zh:
那就必须公开讨论注意力缺乏多动症
心理健康污名

translation.en: the use of medications out in the open, and have a debate
translation.zh: 和药物使用 并讨论

translation.en: about what kind of performance enhancement we should allow
translation.zh:
我们应该允许
哪种类型的成绩提高办法

translation.en: and what we value and don't value in our society.
translation.zh: 我们的社会重视什么 不重视什么

translation.en: [Nathanael] Your experience changes a lot, as you spend time on a medication.
translation.zh: 长时间服药后 你的体验会改变很多

translation.en: Initially, it was definitely jet fuel. I didn't need much at all.
translation.zh:
最初 当然是像喷气燃料
我不需要很多

translation.en: I'd take five or ten milligrams a day and be fine.
translation.zh: 我每天服用5或10毫克就可以了

translation.en: There was a lot of optimism, and a lot of almost obsession with getting things done,
translation.zh: 你会很乐观 会痴迷于把事情做好

translation.en: but it was so fun. And that's not really true anymore.
translation.zh: 但也很有趣 但后来不再是那样

translation.en: So now I take 40 a day.
translation.zh: 所以现在我每天服40毫克

translation.en: I do things to make that stronger, as well.
translation.zh: 我确实也做了些事来加强药效

translation.en: I get up in the morning,
translation.zh: 早上起床后

translation.en: and I have a milky, like, protein shake, which is a base.
translation.zh:
我会喝一杯类似牛奶的蛋白奶昔
这是基本的

translation.en: If I were to have a glass of orange juice,
translation.zh: 如果我喝一杯橙汁

translation.en: that would be very acidic,
translation.zh: 那就会产生酸性

translation.en: and it would destroy a lot of the Adderall before I absorbed it.
translation.zh:
会在我吸收之前
将大部分阿得拉破坏掉

translation.en: Brain-hacking is a subset of the larger biohacking sphere.
translation.zh:
（杰西劳勒
播客主持人 聪明药让人疼痛） 大脑黑客是生物黑客的一个小部分

translation.en: Which is, "I wanna biohack myself and run a mile faster."
translation.zh:
就是：“我想生物黑客自己
更快地跑完一英里”

translation.en: Probably the film Limitless
translation.zh: 或许电影《永无止境》

translation.en: has done more than anything else to make the public think,
translation.zh: 是最能让公众思考

translation.en: "This is a thing. There are drugs that can make a person smarter."
translation.zh:
“真有这个东西
有药物能让人变得更聪明”

translation.en: Like, "Information is pouring into my head like Neo in The Matrix."
translation.zh:
“信息进入我的脑袋
像《黑客帝国》中的尼奥一样”

translation.en: I know kung fu.
translation.zh: 我懂功夫

translation.en: For the last ten years,
translation.zh: 在过去十年中

translation.en: there's been a lot of discussion about cognitive enhancement.
translation.zh: 关于认知增强有过很多讨论

translation.en: A lot of the discussion has been about the ethics of it.
translation.zh: 大多数讨论都是关注伦理方面

translation.en: Is it cheating?
translation.zh: 那算是作弊吗？

translation.en: Or the safety of it.
translation.zh: 或者安全问题

translation.en: But everybody seemed to be assuming that,
translation.zh: 但好像人人都认为

translation.en: of course, it would enhance your cognition.
translation.zh: 当然 它会增强你的认知

translation.en: So we decided to test and find out.
translation.zh: 所以我们决定通过测试来找答案

translation.en: In some very interesting data
translation.zh: 在宾夕法尼亚大学实验室的

translation.en: from Martha Farah at University of Pennsylvania's lab,
translation.zh:
玛莎法拉赫提供的
一些非常有趣的数据中

translation.en: some of the initial trials had been done
translation.zh: 已经做了一些初步试验

translation.en: of college students without any sign of ADHD
translation.zh:
让没有任何
注意力缺乏多动症症状的大学生

translation.en: taking either stimulants or placebo
translation.zh: 服用兴奋剂或安慰剂

translation.en: and every week, getting measures, tests of learning.
translation.zh: 每周进行测量 测试学习情况

translation.en: It was across a huge battery of different tasks.
translation.zh: 经过一系列不同的任务测试后

translation.en: In the end, we found no significant difference
translation.zh: 我们发现阿得拉和安慰剂之间

translation.en: between Adderall and placebo,
translation.zh: 并无明显区别

translation.en: except for one question.
translation.zh: 除了一个问题

translation.en: "Do you feel that the pill you took today enhanced your cognition?"
translation.zh:
“你有没有觉得今天服用的药
增强了你的认知？”

translation.en: [Hinshaw] So one of the conclusions may be that stimulants are very good at boosting
translation.zh:
其中一个结论可能是
兴奋剂非常有利于增强

translation.en: your false self-confidence and how well you're learning.
translation.zh: 虚假的自信心 自以为学习良好

translation.en: People think of amphetamines being smart pills. They're not.
translation.zh:
有人认为安非他命是聪明药
其实不是

translation.en: They certainly can help you stay awake when you should be asleep,
translation.zh:
这种药当然能在你该睡觉时
帮你保持清醒

他非常生我的气

translation.en: I think that he appreciates me being the heavy,
translation.zh: 我想他是感激我当时那么坚持的

translation.en: because if I wasn't, you know...
translation.zh: 因为如果不那样…

translation.en: where would we all be?
translation.zh: 我们现在会怎样？

translation.en: [Nathanael] I was very fortunate.
translation.zh: 我非常幸运

translation.en: I started this process on New Year's, 2016, and said,
translation.zh:
我从2016年新年开始这件事
我当时说

translation.en: "Erin," my girlfriend, "I think I'm going to do a boot camp."
translation.zh:
“伊尔琳” 我女朋友
“我觉得我要做个训练营”

translation.en: And then I did all of the things that I had to do
translation.zh: 然后我做了所有必要的准备

translation.en: to make that happen.
translation.zh: 来实现这个想法

translation.en: One of those things was getting on Adderall.
translation.zh: 其中一件事就是服用阿得拉

translation.en: I pretty much got everything I wanted.
translation.zh: 我确实得到了我想要的一切

translation.en: The pay's great, and a recruiter from Google approached me.
translation.zh: 收益很好 谷歌的招聘人员都来找我

translation.en: And that's crazy. For me, that's crazy.
translation.zh: 太疯狂了 我觉得太疯狂了

translation.en: There's no way any of that would have been possible
translation.zh: 如果不是服药

translation.en: without the medication.
translation.zh: 那一切都不可能实现

translation.en: That might be because I have really severe ADHD,
translation.zh:
或许是因为我真是个
严重的多动症患者

translation.en: and have a hard time performing in the ways needed.
translation.zh: 很难按照需要的方式行事

translation.en: It might be because it was jet fuel and it got me where I needed to go.
translation.zh:
或许是因为那种药有奇效
让我到达了需要到达的终点

translation.en: I don't try to draw a line between those.
translation.zh: 我不会在这两种可能性之间画条线

translation.en: [interviewer] Have you tried any of the stimulants yourself?
translation.zh: 你自己曾经尝试过任何兴奋剂吗？

translation.en: One time, in that first Ritalin study.
translation.zh: 就一次 在第一次利他林研究中

translation.en: It was sort of late afternoon.
translation.zh: 那天下午晚些时候

translation.en: I felt like it was such an enhancement of my day.
translation.zh: 我感觉自己那天强大了不少

translation.en: So, yes, you know, it was a good experience,
translation.zh: 所以 是的 那是很好的体验

translation.en: and thank goodness I did not decide to dip into that barrel ever again.
translation.zh:
谢天谢地 从此我都没有
再打过主意去服用

translation.en: [interviewer] Did you get your grades back already?
translation.zh: 成绩单拿回来了吗？

translation.en: I got one grade back from the exam I took this morning at 10:00.
translation.zh:
有一门课的成绩拿回来了
是我早上10点钟考的

translation.en: And I got an A.
translation.zh: 我得了A

translation.en: The stress really doesn't ever leave entirely.
translation.zh: 压力并没有完全减去

translation.en: But I'm excited, once I graduate, to be able to leave that at work.
translation.zh:
但我很兴奋 等我一毕业
等我工作了就不用吃药了

translation.en: I have a pretty good feeling
translation.zh: 我感觉很好

translation.en: that this will be the end of my relationship with Adderall.
translation.zh: 觉得这将是我和阿得拉关系的终结

translation.en: Hopefully, in the adult world, I'll manage my time well enough
translation.zh:
希望在成人世界里
我能很好地管理时间

translation.en: that there won't be a time where I need to take prescription drugs,
translation.zh: 让我不再需要靠服这种处方药

translation.en: to get my work done.
translation.zh: 就可以把工作做好

translation.en: Hopefully, it's the end.
translation.zh: 希望到此结束

translation.en: I don't know where I will be, but when I picture it,
translation.zh:
我不知道我会去哪里
但当我设想的时候

translation.en: I don't picture myself taking Adderall.
translation.zh: 没想过自己会再服阿得拉

translation.en: [Blue] The purpose of Adderall for me is to focus on work.
translation.zh: 我服阿得拉的目的是专注于工作

translation.en: If I can get to a place where work is running itself
translation.zh: 如果我能到一个工作自行运转

translation.en: and things are okay, then I don't need it.
translation.zh: 事事顺利的状态 就不需要它了

translation.en: If I hit for $200 million dollars tomorrow,
translation.zh: 如果明天我中了两亿美金

translation.en: I'd never take Adderall again.
translation.zh: 我就永远不再服阿得拉

translation.en: But then I need my Adderall to remember to play,
translation.zh:
但我还是需要阿得拉
来让我记住要玩彩票

translation.en: 'cause I keep forgetting to play the lottery. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 因为我总是忘记玩

translation.en: [Ariana] I'm just so much more boring when I'm on my medication.
translation.zh: 服药后 我感觉自己更无聊

translation.en: Also angrier.
translation.zh: 而且更容易生气

translation.en: But yesterday, I had to study all day, so I was on Vyvanse,
translation.zh:
但昨天我必须整天学习
所以我吃了甲磺赖氨酸安非他命

translation.en: and I took an Adderall, and I was wired the whole time.
translation.zh: 还吃了一片阿得拉 我一直很兴奋

translation.en: [chuckles] Felt like shit, but I got my work done.
translation.zh: 感觉很难受 但工作完成了

translation.en: So, it's just this balance you have to figure out.
translation.zh: 所以你必须找到这种平衡

translation.en: [Delaney] I'm just getting a little disillusioned with this higher education thing.
translation.zh:
我开始有点对高等教育这东西
不抱幻想了

translation.en: You need a bachelor's degree to be anybody.
translation.zh: 为了成功 你需要一个学士学位

translation.en: And we're all high on ADD meds as a group of 20-something-year-olds
translation.zh:
作为20多岁的群体
我们都嗑多动症药

translation.en: just fighting each other for...
translation.zh: 相互斗来斗去 就为了…

translation.en: For what? To set the curve in a class?
translation.zh:
为了什么？
为了提高在班级中的成绩？

translation.en: [Schwarz] What you have here is a dynamic
translation.zh: 现在你会意识到

translation.en: of not only people using what is a dangerous drug,
translation.zh:
不仅仅是人们
在使用一种危险的药物

translation.en: particularly when used improperly.
translation.zh: 尤其是使用不当时

translation.en: But you also find a bit of an arms race building up
translation.zh:
而且你会发现
有点军备竞赛升级的意味

translation.en: where if enough people see that their competition is doing it,
translation.zh:
如果有足够的人明白
他们的竞争在服药

translation.en: they feel like they kind of have to do it, too.
translation.zh: 那他们会感觉自己也必须服药

translation.en: [Chatterjee] I think focusing on the use, or abuse, depending on how people feel about this,
translation.zh:
我觉得专注于用药还是滥用
取决于人们的感觉

translation.en: is symptomatic of something broader.
translation.zh: 是一种更宽泛的东西的征兆

translation.en: This highly competitive environment
translation.zh: 在这种高度竞争的环境中

translation.en: in which people feel compelled
translation.zh: 人们感觉被迫

translation.en: to compete beyond their possibilities to get ahead.
translation.zh: 要超越自己的可能性去进步

translation.en: This kind of focus
translation.zh: 这样专注于

translation.en: on material progress and productivity...
translation.zh: 物质进步和生产力…

translation.en: What's the cost of that?
translation.zh: 代价是什么？

translation.en: And is that a cost we're willing to live with?
translation.zh: 是我们愿意付出的代价吗？

translation.en: [Sherry] I wouldn't say that I'm happy to have Adderall,
translation.zh: 我不会说服用阿得拉我很开心

translation.en: but I'm happy that Adderall is an option for him.
translation.zh: 但我开心的是阿得拉是他的一个选择

translation.en: [Jasper] After not being on it all the time,
translation.zh: 很长时间没吃药后

translation.en: I feel more comfortable with who I am, with my body and stuff.
translation.zh:
我感觉现在的自己
无论是身体还是其他的 都更舒服

translation.en: I would never put my kid on Adderall, ever,
translation.zh: 我永远不会让我的孩子服阿得拉

translation.en: 'cause I know what it does to you,
translation.zh: 因为我知道后果是什么

translation.en: and it's not fun being on it.
translation.zh: 吃那种药并不好玩

translation.en: I feel like it was too easy to put
translation.zh: 我觉得人们很容易让孩子

translation.en: a kid on something close to meth and not question it.
translation.zh:
服用甲基苯丙胺之类的东西
却不质疑其后果

translation.en: There's other things you can do. Just teach him how to focus.
translation.zh:
你可以做点其他事
教他如何集中注意力

translation.en: It was about being the best.
translation.zh: 曾经为了做到最好

translation.en: The NFL is a symbol of that level, really.
translation.zh: 橄榄球联盟是成功的标志 确实

translation.en: [interviewer] Do you wish that you had not taken that Ritalin?
translation.zh: 你希望自己没有服用利他林吗？

translation.en: No. I mean, I was doing what I had to do,
translation.zh: 不 我想说 我做了必须做的事

translation.en: and I'm happy to be on this next chapter of my life.
translation.zh: 我很高兴开启生活的新篇章

translation.en: It's never so bad that you can't climb out of the hole.
translation.zh: 爬不出那个坑才是最糟糕的

translation.en: [Brown] Adderall, the drug of our time.
translation.zh: 阿得拉 我们这个时代的药物

translation.en: I suppose the question of what's lost if we all were in an Adderall world,
translation.zh:
我想 如果我们都在阿得拉的世界里
我们忘记问的问题是

translation.en: is the question, "What is it all for?"
translation.zh: “这都是为了什么？”

translation.en: I just lost my thought. Hang on one second.
translation.zh: 我突然短路了 稍等

translation.en: I had it. I had an example.
translation.zh: 刚刚还想着 我有个例子

translation.en: What we also might say is lost is what human beings do
translation.zh: 我们可能还会说 失去是人类

translation.en: when they muse and when they reflect
translation.zh: 在沉思、反省、走神时

translation.en: and when their thoughts wander.
translation.zh: 所做的事”

translation.en: I know what I'll do. Okay.
translation.zh: 我知道要说什么了

translation.en: And out of that comes, what?
translation.zh: 从中会得到什么？

translation.en: Creativity, art,
translation.zh: 创造力、艺术

translation.en: extraordinary moments of human connection.
translation.zh: 人与人之间美妙的心灵相通

translation.en: Of course, also moments of intense human pain and grief,
translation.zh: 当然 也有人类的极度痛苦和悲伤

translation.en: but I would describe them as the experience of being human itself.
translation.zh:
但我会将这些描述为
作为人类本身的体验
